Upscale residential quiet neighborhood 2 blocks from Downtown Point Richmond. Leave close to charming DT in a serene quiet! Perfect for students or for people who work at home. Free WI-Fi. Free DISH TV with some 300 channels including sports channels!

On-site laundry facility and ample street parking are available. most utilities included. Dogs/Cats are OK if they are quite.

The unit has good accessibility to the East Bay, San Francisco and the North Bay with minutes to BART Bay Bridge, HWs 80, 580, 101, Richmond/San Rafael Bridge and Richmond Ferry Terminal. Available in May 2016 - 1,002 ft2 Artist live work space, for one or two persons. 

The prohibition era Milano Hotel now an artist work space building in the C&H sugar factory small town community of Crockett. Located near to I-80 and the Carquinez Bridge.

Work space consist of: 9' high ceiling 540 sq ft red concrete floor studio ideal for a photographer or artist not requiring sunlight. Kitchen, bathroom, living room and bedroom, five windows and wood floors in living areas.

Street access to deli, bars, galleries, fish restaurants, convenience store within a short walk. Port Costa and Bull Valley restaurant just ten minute drive along the Strait. Bus connection with BART but vehicular transport best. This last two years Crockett art community has hosted an Open Studio weekend in November, thirty artist have been involved. The community has a small town feel about it although it's just fifteen minutes from Berkeley and thirty five from SF. 

Interested, come take a look, email you contact information and artist website url.

Milano Gallery at 706 2nd Ave. open Saturday and Sunday midday to 5 pm come by ask to look at the live work space.

www.milanoarts.com

Handsome Upper Glenview Craftsman in available March 1st. We would like at least a 6 -12 month commitment, starting March 1. We are most concerned with finding the right folks who will treat our home as if it was theirs (e.g. keeping place nice and being lovely neighbors).

We are asking for $3600/month.

Gracious home that is the 'best of both worlds' 1920s vintage charm (original hardwood floors, french doors, formal dining room, multi-light windows, wood-burning fireplace), yet is clean and uncluttered with newly renovated bath and kitchen (stainless appliances, instant hot water, gas stove).

MBR with his and hers closets. breakfast room/office, parking spot, washer/dryer. Backyard oasis with stone walkways, bbq, lawn, fruit trees, and organic vegetable/flower beds. 

This is a great neighborhood in upper Glenview (Piedmont side), on a desirable quiet cul-de-sac, wonderful neighbors and pedestrian stairs to Trestle Glen.

Easy walk (2 blocks) to Glenview Village (with favorite restaurants - Bellanico, Park Sushi, Marzano, Blackberry Bistro, market with organics, dry cleaner, nail salons, florist, yoga/pilates studios, mail/business store, and other small businesses. Also 3 block walk to Dimond Park (with recreation center, outdoor public pool, and hiking trails along Sausal creek), and transportation (casual carpool and transbay bus).

Glenview is a charming, friendly, safe neighborhood, right off 580. 4 minutes from Montclair Village, 7 mins from Grand/Lakeshore. About 10-15 mins to Berkeley and campus, and 20 mins (w/o traffic) to downtown SF. Buses run to SF from Glenview, and there are various BART locations about 10 mins away.

*Dishwasher

*Ceiling Fans

*Gas appliances

*Tub/Shower

listings.description:
Monthly: $1950/ month- Deposit: $2000
Weekly: $550/ week- Deposit: $500
Daily: $85/ day- Deposit $100
Utilities: All included. WiFi, electric, water, heat and trash
Furniture: suitcase/ laptop ready.

This is a downstairs 1 bed/ 1 bath unit with a separate entrance. The living room has a large picture window that overlooks the backyard. And has a partial view of the Bay. The unit has a kitchenette that offers a toaster oven, a two burner electric stove top, a microwave oven, a mini fridge with a freezer, a digital coffee maker, a tea pot, a food processor and basic kitchenware for simple everyday cooking. The place also has a full bath with a tub, and a bedroom. The living room has a futon that opens up to be a full bed, & a chaise that opens up to be a twin bed. The bedroom has a comfortable queen bed with a brand new nice mattress, and two large closets. All linens and towels are included.

You will have your private separate entrance off of the side of the house. Our washer and dryer are located in the garage, and you will need to coordinate your washing time with us, which won't be hard since one of us works from home and available often.

We can interact as much or as little as our guest is comfortable with. We will be more than happy to share our knowledge of the area in which we lived in for years.

The house is located on Arlington Boulevard, on the borders between Richmond and El Cerrito. This is a very quiet and nice area, with plenty of street parking. We are close to parks, about a mile away from Wildcat Canyon Park. If you like to walk and/ or bike, this is the place to be.
Street parking is available and plentiful.

You can continue directly on Arlington Boulevard to Berkeley with no stop lights to avoid traffic in the morning commute hours. We are a walkable 1.2 miles away from El Cerrito del Norte BART station, restaurants & shopping. Safeway is a little over a mile away, there is a convenience store less than 500 feet away from us. Several great restaurants are located within 2 miles from us.

Über charges $6 for a ride to and from BART station. We have easy access to Hwy 80 and 580.

There is a direct bus (H) that goes from a station four minutes walk from our house to San Francisco downtown.

House Rules:

No parties, no louds music, and no smoking. We are not providing a TV in order to keep the noise down. If you decided to get a TV, please keep the sound low, or get headphones. Wifi is available for you to replace the TV.

Please email us the following info with your inquiry: 
1) Full name 
2) Why do you need temp housing? 
3) If you are an academic, where are you visiting from, and what level are you (undergrad? post-doc? professor?..etc ) 
4) If you are employed, what is your job and the name of your company? 
5) Specific arrival and departure dates 
6) Will you bring a car? 
7) Have you visited the Bay Area previously?
listings.title: Great Richmond unit perfect for a traveling nurse/ visiting scholar

listings.description:
MODERN AND SPACIOUS WEST END COMMONS LOFT-STYLE TOWNHOME

Building: West End Commons
Neighborhood: Clausen
Bedrooms: 1 BR + Den
Bathrooms: 1 BA
Style: Townhouse
Parking: Deeded
Square Feet: 965
Security Deposit: 1.5 Months
Lease Term: 1 Year
Must Provide Credit Report and Income/Employment Verification, Good Credit Required

This 2-level detached townhouse has no shared walls and no neighbors above or below. High ceiling heights, modern architectural elements, and expansive windows and skylight give this 1 bedroom plus den, 1 bathroom unit, an abundance of natural light.

This loft-style home is spacious, with an open living, dining, and work space. A beautiful open kitchen offers granite countertops, bamboo cabinetry, and top-of-the-line stainless steel Bosch appliances including a refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, gas oven/range, Nest Thermostat, and garbage disposal. The straight staircase leads to the spacious second floor with one bedroom, a large walk-in closet, a den, and a good-sized bathroom with 2 wall-mounted Duravit sinks + custom built vanities, a tiled shower/bathtub, and high-grade lighting fixtures.

Designed by the award-winning firm David Baker + Partners, the individual townhouses at West End Commons combine the functional and stylish aspects of a loft with more traditional aspects of home design. Large open floor plans are paired with well-appointed kitchens and bathrooms as well as more secluded sleeping areas on the upper floors. Each of the townhouses opens on to 1 of 5 lanes. Lined with pavers, lit by streetlights, and landscaped with trees, vines, and grasses, the lanes create an intimate retreat that was inspired by classic urban neighborhoods such as Brooklyn Heights, London's Islington, and Boston's North End. A path leading through shared green space provides an inviting place to wander or meet up with friends, neighbors, or clients.

Located in Oakland's West Clawson neighborhood just 2 blocks south of Emeryville, the development has easy access to all of Emeryville's shops, eateries, grocery stores, and entertainment.

Unit Features:

• 1 bedroom plus den, 1 bathroom bi-level detached townhouse
• 965 sq. ft. 
• High ceilings
• Kitchen features stainless steel Bosch appliances
• Polished concrete floors on first floor, carpet on second floor
• Bathroom with Duravit sinks, subway tiled shower/bathtub, and high-grade lighting fixtures
• Track lighting
• Stackable Bosch washer/dryer in unit
• Central heat and tankless water heater
• Secure parking space right in front of unit
• Pets will be considered on an individual basis

Complex Features:

• Controlled-access intercom/telephone entry system
• Beautifully landscaped including small green park with picnic table
• San Francisco Bay Trail soon to open right in front of complex, connecting you to a variety of hiking, bikin,g and jogging paths that will stretch for 400 miles throughout the Bay Area
• Close to Brown Sugar Kitchen and Kilovolt Coffee
• Easy access to Bay Bridge, Downtown Oakland BART, Jack London Square, Rockridge, Berkeley, and all major freeways
• Short walk to EmeryGoRound Free Shuttle w/ Service to BART, Bay Street Shopping and Emeryville Marina / AC Transit

listings.description:
1121 - 40th Street Unit 4205, Emeryville
Rental Rates continue rising in SF. Come to sunny Emeryville!!!
Andante Condominiums
1121 40th Street, Emeryville

ABOUT THE UNIT
This unit is located on the 2nd floor facing adaline st and garden. Very well detailed unit with 1 bedroom and 1 full bath. Bright, airy open kitchen and dining room combination with living room area and deck. Excellent exposure to afternoon summer sun. All modern stainless appliance upgrades too. Includes dishwasher, granite countertop, refrigerator, microwave, wood floor, carpet. Parking space included. Approximately 625 square foot unit.

ABOUT THE LOCATION
Andante is located at a premiere corner of Emeryville, at the intersection of San Pablo Ave, 40th and Adeline Streets. Andante is close to Bay Area transportation, Bay Bridge, University of California Berkeley, downtown Oakland, walking distance to many Emeryville's jobs, including Chiron and Pixar Studios. Excellent public transportation to BART, AC Transit to downtown Oakland and San Francisco.

ABOUT THE BUILDING
The Andante is a 125-unit condominium development on 1.83 acres of land in the heart of Emeryville. It is located on the site of the King Midas Card Club, which closed in 1998.
This mixed-use building was designed by HDO Architect Planners, developed by SNK Development and completed in 2005. Amenities include gated secured entry, a fitness center, spa, elevators to all residential levels, private open space/courtyard with seating area and parking for 263 cars. There is 15,000 square feet of ground floor commercial space consisting of restaurants and retail stores.
One- bedroom floor plans at the Andante include sound-controlled walls and floors, granite countertops, laminated wood flooring in the entry and kitchen, ceramic tile flooring in the bathroom, birch and cherry laminated cabinets with satin chrome pulls and an 8-inch-deep dual stainless steel sink. Unit offers upgraded plumbing fixtures, including a Kohler pull-spray kitchen faucet, walk-in closets with shelving, private outdoor space and abundant natural light.

For more information, contact Fred Vaghar at



http://www.andanteemeryville.com for more pics!

This contemporary condo offers outstanding location in Emeryville's most desirable location. Located on the corner of 40th & San Pablo off Adeline St. This sophisticated unit features the following amenities:

* Excellent commute location - just minutes from SF & most bay area cities
* 1 bedroom with walk-in closet, 9 foot ceilings, plush carpet & upgraded laminate wood flooring
* Second Level unit with natural sunlight on both sides of the unit
* Elevator in building from parking garage.
* Gated community with manicured gardens, & pass card entry.

Welcome To Higby

Built In 2015.

A refined living experience in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley. With modern apartments and inviting common areas, Higby creates a place that is both home and a gathering space. Within walking distance to craft breweries, celebrated restaurants, organic markets and cultural highlights, Higby celebrated exploration and adventure. 

Higby offers studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley

Modern building amenities include: 
•	Lobby with lounge seating and TV
•	Courtyard with a bocce ball court
•	Roof deck with a barbecue, fire pit, lounge seating and city views
•	Fitness studio
•	Indoor bike storage and work stand
•	Enclosed residential parking garage

Apartment units feature: 
•	Electric ovens
•	Gas range cooktops
•	Dishwashers
•	Washers and dryers

Higby is designed to operate 25% more efficiently than a code-compliant building. Sustainability highlights contributing to Higby's LEED Gold certification include:
•	Locally sourced and recycle content materials
•	Non-toxic finishes and a building-wide green cleaning program
•	Aggressive construction waste recycling program
•	Native, adaptive plantings to reduce water consumption
•	On-site planters to detain and manage storm water 

So Stretch out. Entertain. Sleep it off. Celebrate pajama day. Declare a lost weekend. Take a conference call from home. Do what you do. Live At Higby.

listings.description:
This sunny, charming 1 bedroom apartment is in a private home in desirable Elmwood neighborhood of Berkeley. Looking for quiet single tenant. The unit is on the second floor, east side of home with morning and afternoon sun. The private entrance open onto a small porch overlooking a pleasant backyard. Newly renovated bathroom, tile floor and shower, modern towel warmer and new tankless water heater. The full size kitchen has a new granite countertop, new cabinets (and some original cabinets too) and a vintage Wedgewood gas stove. 
Located in a residential neighborhood, treelined street with residential preferential parking. Easy walk to the Elmwood shopping district, movie theater, library, and restaurants, Whole Foods, Berkeley Bowl, AC transit buses, 7 blocks to Bart, and 9 blocks to UC campus.
No laundry on site but a laundromat is nearby. No pets, no smoking, no off street parking. Available March 1. Year lease, first and last month's rent plus $600 damage/cleaning deposit to move in. PG&E, water and internet are tenant's responsibility. Internet ready. Heat(radiant) is provided by owner.
If interested, please respond to this ad with information about yourself, your employment or student status.

Available May 15, 2015. 
High ceilings/top floor! $2650/month ($2,850 couple) including water and garbage. Wifi, cable, electricity, and enclosed parking additional. Nine month minimum. Prefer at least one year; long-term residency desired.

Rent my roomy, furnished sunny one-bedroom modern condo (about 80 sq. meters or 900 sq. ft. w/ covered balcony). On top floor (4th) of redecorated building with elevator. 15-foot-high ceiling in living/dining room; breakfast counter/bar; computer area (with modern workforce® computer desk, cabinet storage, counter space); wall-to-wall carpeting and parquet kitchen/hall floors; large closet; full-sized newer washer and dryer IN UNIT, large new stainless steel refrigerator, dishwasher; garbage disposal; microwave; bathroom with tub/shower. Wood-burning fireplace. Living room opens onto skylight-covered private balcony with view to the park for al fresco dining.

Apartment furnishings include queen-sized bed, dresser, kitchen utensils, dishes, pots and pans, linens. Queen futon couch, two comfy easy chairs and ottoman, TV, DVD & VCR players, desk, solid maple dining room table and chairs. Overstuffed upholstered chairs [shown] and futon [shown] and larger computer desk recently replaced the vintage bamboo and wicker furniture in some photos. Roof deck with 360° views, great for sun-worshippers or stargazing. This is in addition to your private view balcony with umbrella, table and chairs and lush plants. 

This desirable Adams Point condo is across from lovely Lake Merritt in Oakland, just off Grand Ave., walking distance to 19th St. BART station and Grand/Lakeshore shopping district including Arizmendi Bakery, coffeehouses (Peet's, Starbucks), beautiful Whole Foods (walking distance), Trader Joe's, Noah's bagels, fine restaurants and cafes; Rockridge and Piedmont Ave. shopping and recreation minutes away by car or bike. Sunday farmer's market at Jack London Square, or Saturday's in neighborhood -- and then there's always Chinatown restaurants and markets. Walking distance or short drive to the hip new Uptown District's trendy restaurants, bars and art galleries. You'll love my neighborhood!

Short commute to San Francisco, Emeryville, Berkeley (UC) or Mills College; 15 minute walk to downtown Oakland 19th St. BART. Rent includes garbage and water. One reserved parking space in secure garage in building available. Cable ready. ($2975 One person all-inclusive includes Wifi, cable, electricity allowance, local phone and parking.) Move-out cleaning fee of $75 and security deposit required.

Please E-mail with your DATES, PERSONAL INFORMATION and PHONE NUMBER for call back.
BUT -- VERY IMPORTANT: FIRST Please tell me a little about yourself as the most important thing is that you are responsible, dependable, and quiet, and will respect my condo and neighbors. Where do you work? Where do you live now and why do you want a sublet, etc.? I need to know about you and then talk to you before I will schedule an appointment or confirm. Thank you!

listings.description:
Welcome To Higby

Built In 2015.

A refined living experience in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley. With modern apartments and inviting common areas, Higby creates a place that is both home and a gathering space. Within walking distance to craft breweries, celebrated restaurants, organic markets and cultural highlights, Higby celebrated exploration and adventure. 

Higby offers studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley

Modern building amenities include: 
•	Lobby with lounge seating and TV
•	Courtyard with a bocce ball court
•	Roof deck with a barbecue, fire pit, lounge seating and city views
•	Fitness studio
•	Indoor bike storage and work stand

Apartment units feature: 
•	Electric ovens
•	Gas range cooktops

Higby is designed to operate 25% more efficiently than a code-compliant building. Sustainability highlights contributing to Higby's LEED Gold certification include:

•	Non-toxic finishes and a building-wide green cleaning program

So Stretch out. Entertain. Sleep it off. Celebrate pajama day. Declare a lost weekend. Take a conference call from home. Do what you do. Live At Higby.

The Space

How would you like to stay in a spacious light-filled 2 storey live/work art loft with dramatic high exposed-beam ceiling and massive rooms with endless possibilities? Experience all that the Bay area has to offer and come rest in this modern urban retreat with a unique architectural design that is created to inspire. Perfect for technology start-ups, vacation stays, corporate rentals, sabbaticals and work-from-home professionals and artists. Great for sharing between students and professionals too!

Our art loft has a full open kitchen, family room, large bedrooms and open space. Secured gated access, ground floor, 1 private parking space and plenty of off-street parking. Newly furnished with 1 king-sized bed, 2 full-sized beds, 1 queen sleeper sofa and 2 twin futon beds. All utilities, cable TV and internet included.

Highly desirable location in vibrant high-tech Emeryville. FREE Emery-go-round shuttle to BART and shopping, easy access to freeway and SF, minutes to gourmet grocery stores and Bay street shopping mall. Walking distance to Pixar, Leap Frog, Novartis, Bayer, etc. Near UC Berkeley and Berkeley Labs. Can't get any better!

Apply online at miravistaproperties.CO
listings.title: Luxurious work-live Art Loft!

listings.description:
in this 851 sq. ft. 1 bedroom condo at Watergate, Emeryville's premiere resort condominium community. It's a commuter's dream just 15 minutes from SF, 10 minutes from UC Berkeley.
Upgrades include  The large dining room will accommodate a good sized dining room set and the spacious bedroom has two large closets with mirror doors that bounce back the water view. This extraordinary condo is located  with one of the year round heated swimming pools with an indoor entrance, an indoor spa and a coed sauna as well as ping pong and racquetball courts. For a handy happy hour with delicious pupus or a great Polynesian themed meal, Trader Vics is just a few yards from the building entrance.
Watergate is an urban oasis in the heart of the Bay Area. Its central location, free shuttle to BART, well established casual carpool to SF and dedicated freeway entrance to Bay Bridge approach makes for an easy commute to SF or anywhere in the East Bay.  
Rent includes parking, water, hot water, garbage and 82 channels of cable TV. AVAILABLE APPROX. MARCH 19+/- for $2,395 on a 1 year lease. Security deposit $2,695. Application fee $30 per person. There is also a $30 per person move-in fee ($25 of which is refundable). NO PETS, NO SMOKING please. 
For more information or to view,  (BRE# 00692528) at the Realty World - Waterfront Sales and Leasing Office in the heart of the Watergate Complex. 
Realty World Waterfront (DRE #01943875) :: 10 Commodore Drive, Emeryville :: Office Ph.

:: Office open 10-5 M-F, 11-4 Sat-Sun.

listings.description:
Beautifully renovated, sunny, 2 bedroom, 2 bath, single-family home with 3 bonus rooms. 
Available April 1, 2016

See photos at http://www.2419curtis.shutterfly.com 

Kitchen with granite counters, dishwasher, stainless steel cooking range and refrigerator. 
Luxurious Radiant heating and hardwood floors is great for people with allergies and pulmonary problems 
Charming bathroom with skylight, granite counters, and more 
Living room with built-in bookshelves and fireplace 
Huge sunny backyard and peaceful garden with lawn, rosebushes, fruit trees, birds and flowers all year round. 6 foot tall, 3 tier, Mediterranean water fountain to soothe you as you enjoy the garden.

Energy-efficient new windows and insulated ceiling and walls 
Large bonus rooms in the basement with plenty of light - great for office, guest room, media room, playroom, etc. 
Cable and phone hookups in every room 
Washer and dryer, one car garage, and one off street parking space in driveway 

Close to elementary schools - Black Pine Circle, Berkeley Montessori, Ecole Bilangue and Rosa Parks Elementary.

One half block from the AC Transit Busline, 2 blocks to various San Pablo bus lines 
About 5 minutes by car or bike to: North Berkeley BART, New Berkeley Bowl, Interstate 80, UC Berkeley, Aquatic Park (great for kids!) or the Berkeley Marina 

Less than 2 minute walk to Long Branch, Paisan and CafeTrieste (live music several nights each week), in the heart of Berkeley's new Bohemia. 

Rent is $4200 per month. Text

to setup an appointment to see the house. 

Non-smokers only. Pet's negotiable. Tenant pays garden care, garbage and utilities. One year lease.

listings.description:

listings.description:
Located on the second floor of an attractive 4-unit building in UC Berkeley's popular "southside" neighborhood, this sunny apartment has 4 bedrooms (two are very large), 2 full bathrooms, and a large living area. Two of the bedrooms and 1 bathroom were part of a recently completed addition. The kitchen was partly remodeled, and the apartment has refinished hardwood floors throughout. The apartment features 1920s-style details, and is in very good condition. It has its own private entryway from the street. There is a washer and dryer inside the apartment, as well as an in-demand water heater (tank-less, energy-efficient). The UCB campus is just a few blocks away. Maximum 6 adults. No smoking. No pets. Garbage paid by landlord. Off-street parking may be available for additional rent. Available June 1.

Square footage is approximate.

About the unit: 
• Great location, close to all transportation; buses, convenient freeway access and 5 mins walk to Ashby BART
• Very quiet street with easier parking than most of Berkeley
• Hardwood floor throughout. 
• Fully equipped kitchen with recess lighting, granite counter top, gas stove, and dishwasher. 
• Porcelain tiles in kitchen and bathroom. 
• Private laundry room including washer and dryer. 
• Private garden area. 
• Minutes from Berkeley bowl grocery store and Sweet Adeline bakery. 
• Water and Garbage included in rent. Tenant pays only PG&E.

Non smoking building. Sorry, no pets.

Call me for an appointment to see the place:
Phone:


Location: 2023 Parker St., Berkeley, CA 94704

The unit is situated near the rear of the building, very secluded, ground floor, quiet neighbors. There is a bedroom closet and a hall closet. The living room also has some storage space. If need be, you can even store some things in the garage. There is on site laundry. There is room for a garden in the back yard. You can connect to my wireless router for internet access.

Call me, Mark, at

to arrange an appointment so I can show you around. Please do not disturb the other tenants in the building. The best times for me are in the mornings and evenings on weekdays and all day on weekends.

My story: I was just another apartment renter and software engineer until December of '05, when my landlord suddenly decided to sell this great old 4-plex home which I had lived in for ten years. Needless to say, I jumped at the chance to become a home-owner. My extended family of handy and creative types helped me fix the place up.
listings.title: Sweet 1br, Living Room w/ Fireplace, Gas Oven, Laundry

listings.description:
Includes a private deck with view! This one is good especially for someone who need storage in the unit, and likes to spend time in the kitchen - it has a large eat-in kitchen. A large deck with panoramic view. The Living room has large 4 windows and view.



Available for rent March 10 for nonsmokers only.



If you want a modern place may be this one is not for you . . . but, if you yearn for a Victorian sunny habitat with original Victorian (recently refinished) hardwood floors, high ceiling and view . . . 


When you think about it, there is very little competition for Point Richmond's sensation and the deep relaxation that it gives you. My wife and I have been going there from 2002, just to recharge our spirits. A special, different place on the bay.




Located two blocks from Charming downtown Pt Richmond, quiet upscale residential, A short walk to restaurants, shopping, post office, Starbucks etc. For more information about Point Richmond, see http://www.pointrichmond.com/ 

- Please watch a short video about Point Richmond sights: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4vuS8k_vLZA&list=PLhLAMl2nWuUpPJtPq7Y3an2aW_p1DFrbx&index=28

Please see review of 24 Point Richmond Downtown restaurants on yelp http://www.yelp.com/search?find_desc=Restaurants+Downtown&find_loc=Point+Richmond%2C+CA

- "Simple Pleasures" with Patrick Kelly Jones - if you are up for a little walking around for some of the best view of the Bay Area: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v1M8q8kNzhY


Travel, according to Google map, depending on traffic but gives you an idea: Golden Gate, San Francisco 21 minutes, Bay Bridge, San Francisco 20 minutes, University Ave, Berkeley 12 minutes, Richmond BART 8 minutes, Center of San Rafael CA North Bay 13 minutes.

Applicants must be non-smokers and have no criminal record.









A bright and sunny end unit with view of Point Richmond. Features eat-in kitchen with lots (about 13) of cupboards, gas oven/stove & full-size refrigerator. Gas cooking, cold and hot water, and garbage are included. Features a large living room with three large windows, large kitchen, and a bedroom with build in drawers and shelves. Two large closets, and a large 3 part linen closet in the bathroom. The airflow is very effectively controlled by the living room window ?C to which degree they are opened.





A large 'community' back yard/deck with a little garden which gets afternoon sun; a good place for sun-bathing and barbecuing. On-site laundry facility and ample street parking are available. most utilities included. Dogs/Cats are OK if they are quite. Street parking always available for you and your guests.





The unit has good accessibility to the East Bay, San Francisco and the North Bay with minutes to BART Bay Bridge, HWs 80, 580, 101, Richmond/San Rafael Bridge and Richmond Ferry Terminal. There is one park 2 blocks away and additional two parks and a beach for swimming within walking distance (Approx. 500 yards). The building is surrounded by charming hiking/walking trails with a view of the bay.







The area is considered an upscale quite residential neighborhood. To view pictures: Please log on to http://www.flickr.com/photos/garyluria/ look for Click on 'group list' at the top part of the page and then select group 405-6 and you should be able to view the pics. You can also view the house. You can also view a short video at : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wbpoM9aIkfs 

.







Directions from Berkeley: Take Richmond Parkway exit; veer to the right; make left to Castro St; another left at the second light still on Castro street; drive straight w/Castro up the hill for about 50 yards or so and turn left to W Richmond Ave. for about 50 yards or so and park at Martina St. 

Please call Gary at

or e-mail back.

It is also conveniently close to buses and Amtrak, and has easy access to Hwy 580/80. The property adds an extra level of privacy with a high fence and front gate. This beautiful, charming Berkeley hills apartment is the ideal location for someone who seeks the peace and relaxation of a beautiful, natural setting. 

5 minutes away from grocery stores, cafes, restaurants, shopping, etc. on Solano Ave, living here, you will enjoy a large, sunny deck displaying dramatic views of Tilden park. Very friendly neighborhood, nestled in a green and lush cul de sac of 4 houses.

listings.description:
Fine Arts Apartment for rent from 23. Mai to 8. August. (Option to extend)

We are 4 international students looking to sublet our appartment in Berkeley for the summer (w/ option to extend after our contract expires). The appartment have 2 big bedrooms, with 2 beds and 1 built-in closet in each (which makes room for a total of 4 people). It also has a private kitchen, livingroom and bathroom (w/ shower and bath tub). You will have access to a common laundry room (w/ drying machenes) and a rooftop (perfect for those warm summer afternoons!). 

*We own some of the furniture (except a dinner table w/ 4 chairs which comes with the appartment). This includes a sofa, living room table, 4 beds, 4 chairs, kitchen equipment and 2 dressers (all from IKEA). We will offer to sell these to you for a reasonable price. Even better, we also have 3 bikes that you can choose to buy. We really recommend having bicycles in Berkeley, as it makes it really easy to go to Uni (and give you some more minutes to snooze in the morning..) and the nearby supermarkets (Berkeley Bowl is only 4 minutes bicycles ride away!). Best of all, you can park them in the parking garage, and we'll throw in 2 locks. 

Video of the apartment: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S9ZchX03UWI

If you want to move straight into a fully furnished appartment for easy living in Berkeley, this is definately your place!

We will be happy to answer any questions you may have. Please contact us in either telephone or email.

listings.description:
Welcome To Higby

Built In 2015.

A refined living experience in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley. With modern apartments and inviting common areas, Higby creates a place that is both home and a gathering space. Within walking distance to craft breweries, celebrated restaurants, organic markets and cultural highlights, Higby celebrated exploration and adventure. 

Higby offers studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley

Modern building amenities include: 
•	Lobby with lounge seating and TV
•	Courtyard with a bocce ball court
•	Roof deck with a barbecue, fire pit, lounge seating and city views
•	Fitness studio
•	Indoor bike storage and work stand
•	Enclosed residential parking garage

Apartment units feature: 
•	Electric ovens
•	Gas range cooktops
•	Dishwashers
•	Washers and dryers

Higby is designed to operate 25% more efficiently than a code-compliant building. Sustainability highlights contributing to Higby's LEED Gold certification include:
•	Locally sourced and recycle content materials
•	Non-toxic finishes and a building-wide green cleaning program
•	Aggressive construction waste recycling program
•	Native, adaptive plantings to reduce water consumption
•	On-site planters to detain and manage storm water 

So Stretch out. Entertain. Sleep it off. Celebrate pajama day. Declare a lost weekend. Take a conference call from home. Do what you do. Live At Higby.


Office Hours
Monday 9am - 6pm
Tuesday 9am - 6pm
Wednesday 9am - 6pm
Thursday 9am - 6pm
Friday 9am - 6pm
Saturday 10am - 5pm
Sunday 10am - 5pm

3015 SAN PABLO AVE, Berkeley, CA 94702

Contact us



www.livehigby.com

listings.description:
A very large, beautiful one plus bed room apartment with large dining room which could be used as a second bedroom with its own closets and French doors. Newly finished hardwood floor, new paint, built in bookshelves in the living room and a separate dining room. A dishwasher in the kitchen and a built in breakfast nook which seats 4.

Storage/private basement in the apartment with built in drawers.

Wonderful natural light throughout. Full bathroom with a bathtub. 

Excellent location, walk to UC Berkeley, The Cheeseboard, Farmer's market, The Rose Garden and public transportation.

On the first floor of a two story building which opens to a patio from the kitchen. 

Available now.
One year lease minimum.
Security deposit $ 4000.

Water and Garbage included in the rent. Tenant pays for electricity and Internet service.
No laundry facility on premises and no parking available on site, but plenty of street parking available.

Open house on Tuesday between 5 - 5:30. Please email

if you are coming to the open house.

listings.title: We've Got Your 2 Bedroom You've Been Dreaming About!

listings.description:
Includes a private deck with view! This one is good especially for someone who need storage in the unit, and likes to spend time in the kitchen - it has a large eat-in kitchen. A large deck with panoramic view. The Living room has large 4 windows and view.



Available for rent March 10 for nonsmokers only.



If you want a modern place may be this one is not for you . . . but, if you yearn for a Victorian sunny habitat with original Victorian (recently refinished) hardwood floors, high ceiling and view . . . 


When you think about it, there is very little competition for Point Richmond's sensation and the deep relaxation that it gives you. My wife and I have been going there from 2002, just to recharge our spirits. A special, different place on the bay.




Located two blocks from Charming downtown Pt Richmond, quiet upscale residential, A short walk to restaurants, shopping, post office, Starbucks etc. For more information about Point Richmond, see http://www.pointrichmond.com/ 

- Please watch a short video about Point Richmond sights: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4vuS8k_vLZA&list=PLhLAMl2nWuUpPJtPq7Y3an2aW_p1DFrbx&index=28

Please see review of 24 Point Richmond Downtown restaurants on yelp http://www.yelp.com/search?find_desc=Restaurants+Downtown&find_loc=Point+Richmond%2C+CA

- "Simple Pleasures" with Patrick Kelly Jones - if you are up for a little walking around for some of the best view of the Bay Area: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v1M8q8kNzhY


Travel, according to Google map, depending on traffic but gives you an idea: Golden Gate, San Francisco 21 minutes, Bay Bridge, San Francisco 20 minutes, University Ave, Berkeley 12 minutes, Richmond BART 8 minutes, Center of San Rafael CA North Bay 13 minutes.

Applicants must be non-smokers and have no criminal record.









A bright and sunny end unit with view of Point Richmond. Features eat-in kitchen with lots (about 13) of cupboards, gas oven/stove & full-size refrigerator. Gas cooking, cold and hot water, and garbage are included. Features a large living room with three large windows, large kitchen, and a bedroom with build in drawers and shelves. Two large closets, and a large 3 part linen closet in the bathroom. The airflow is very effectively controlled by the living room window ?C to which degree they are opened.





A large 'community' back yard/deck with a little garden which gets afternoon sun; a good place for sun-bathing and barbecuing. On-site laundry facility and ample street parking are available. most utilities included. Dogs/Cats are OK if they are quite. Street parking always available for you and your guests.





The unit has good accessibility to the East Bay, San Francisco and the North Bay with minutes to BART Bay Bridge, HWs 80, 580, 101, Richmond/San Rafael Bridge and Richmond Ferry Terminal. There is one park 2 blocks away and additional two parks and a beach for swimming within walking distance (Approx. 500 yards). The building is surrounded by charming hiking/walking trails with a view of the bay.

listings.title: Cute Duplex In The Heart Of Berkeley

listings.description:
Perfect condo for students and/or young professionals available on and after 4/4

This lovely 1 bedroom/1 bath, 745 sq ft apartment features laminate floors throughout (ex-kitchen and bathroom), floor to ceiling windows, 4 big closets, an balcony on the high floor with a refreshing view of green hills and hiking trails, as well as, spacious bedroom and living room. 

Enjoy a comfortable living with kitchen appliances including electric stove/oven, dishwater, refrigerator, trash disposal, and recirculating range hood. Let alone to say the additional perks such as free heated water, one parking space, and one storage space on the lobby floor.

This place is also a commuter's heaven with 
* the AC transit stops right in front of the building and takes you to downtown SF or UC Berkeley within 30 minutes
* 8 minute drive to El Cerrito Plaza BART station
* daily casual carpool stop is also available in front of the 99 Ranch Market, within 5-minute walk

The Gateview Apartments complex is truly a unique and wonderful place to call home, with:
* 24-hr security/patrol, 
* guest parking upon registration, 
* on-site laundry,
* a modern gym, 
* aerobics room, 
* heated pool, 
* tennis courts, 
* Jacuzzi, 
* Sauna room, 
* club house (need reservation), 
* manicured garden, 
* modernized elevators, and
* on-site mailbox

Staying at this complex means you will be able to walk to:
* Solano Street restaurants, 
* a variety of grocers (99 Ranch Market, Lucky, Trader Joe's), 
* farmers' market (Tuesdays and Saturdays), and
* the eucalyptus grove (hiking trail).

Costco,Safeway, Target, the Tokyo Fish Market, and El Cerrito Yoga are all within 10 minutes drive. 
You can even get to IKEA, AMC theater, Golden Gate Fields (for horse racing), Albany bulb (pet lovers' paradise), and Kaady Car Wash (aka best of East Bay) within 15 minutes of drive. Convenient access to freeways 80/580/880, 20 minutes to SF (when there's no traffic), 45 minutes to Napa.

Albany also has a very reputable school district with Albany High (9 out of 10), Albany Middle (9 out of 10), Cornell Elementary (9 out of 10). 

Monthly rent: $2200

Terms & Conditions
* initial 6 month lease, after which renewable month by month
* first and last month rent + $1000 security/cleaning deposit
* small- to medium-sized cat or dog are okay but tenant needs to put up additional $300 deposit for each pet
* tenant is responsible for $400 of move-in cost, and $250 for each subsequent move-in (charged by the HOA)
* monthly rent is subject to annual adjustment to cover for increases in property tax and HOA dues
* water and garbage expenses are covered by the landlord. And tenant will be responsible for all other utilities such as internet, cable TV, and electricity.
* strict policy against sublet, but co-lease may be okay upon interview
* strict no-smoking (of any kind), no-drinking-party policy
* The ideal candidate should be responsible, considerate, respectful to others, clean, friendly and paying rent on time

To apply, please
* Provide current credit report (dated within 1 month of application)
* 2 professional references
* Proof of stable financial resources: such as last 2 months of pay stubs or bank statements
* International students are OK
* a brief description of your background, education, occupation, hobby and/or lifestyle

CL mail to schedule appointment for showing; appointments available starting this weekend.

listings.description:
Are you part of a group, and looking for a gorgeous house right near UC Berkeley, in the most yummy part of town -- in the northside gourmet ghetto?

For more than 10 years, our house has been hosting groups of undergrads and grad students. Everyone who has lived here has loved it. Your group, will too!

This house is fully furnished with a total of 20 beds within 7 bedrooms.

Your group of up to 20 can rent the entire house, or, you can rent a block of beds.

The house is open for move-in August 15 2016. We also have availabilities during the summer for anyone who needs summer accommodations.

House Features and Details You'll Appreciate. . .
- Awesome 170 meg download internet! This house is ultra wired and ready to roll!
- 7 bedrooms: 1 Single, 2 Doubles, 2 Triples, and 2 Quads, all are furnished.
- The rooms are quite large with fantastic views, big windows, sunlight. Most rooms have twin beds, the single has a full bed.
- Huge living/dining room & kitchen fully equipped with everything you'll need to cook, 3 refrigerators
- Big-Screen HDTV, 2 printers, NEST smart thermostats so you can easily monitor heating usage in winter
- Washer/dryer, dishwasher, up to date appliances
- So close to campus, you can walk in 5 to 15 minutes depending where you're going.
- Perfect Location in the Gourmet Ghetto.... Berkeley's finest restaurants, a drugstore just down the block, multiple grocery stores & farmer's markets
- Redwood deck in the back is the perfect place to hang out in the sun, study, have a get-together, BBQ
- Green electricity from solar panels, numerous other ecological house features

Rental Price
Important Note -- The rental price listed, $1699, is the average cost per person per month if you book in advance and you are part of a group. Multiply that number by the number of people in your group to get the total cost per month. The price may be higher or lower depending on size of group, send us an application for further details. Utilities cost is an average of 100 per person per month. 

Want to See More Photos & a Video?
Email us for way more photos plus a video tour of the house.

How To Apply
Please email us and we'll respond with details on how to apply.

Thanks, we look forward to meeting you soon. And... GO BEARS!

listings.description:
Renters are facing really difficult times right now with very high rent, crazy security deposits, no pets being accepted and landlords want you to have perfect credit and income 3 times or 4 higher than the rent just to allow you to rent their house and pay it off for them. Then they want to increase the rent every time the lease it up and in many cases ask you to move so they can sell the house or move back into it. 

We can send you all of the program information in writing just by sending a request. it includes all of our licensing information. Most people qualify when they have a 620 or higher credit score and can document your income. We get so many people who worry this is a scam but everything we provide you is verifiable through multiple governmental sources.

I have sold homes from Berkeley to Discovery Bay for 27 years. I have managed special financing programs provided by the State and Federal Government that encourage renters to become home owners by providing financing options that don't require perfect credit and in most cases cost less to get into than a rental these days. The financing is 30 year fixed rate and includes property taxes, and all the insurance. Simply put, people who bought homes 15 years ago are still paying the same payment they had originally and you will have the same payment 15 years after you buy the house. Landlords will obviously not be keeping the rent at the same level.

In addition there are tax benefits that you get as a homeowner that help most people save thousands per year in Income Tax. This is the part where many people start to think this is a scam or baloney in general. To help with that we offer two things. I am going to give you ways to confirm the information. In addition I can send you an e mail that has both detailed breakdowns on the programs as well as an e mail that has the properties available with pictures and details. 

The programs that we utilize are FHA, VA, USDA Guaranteed, we also use CHDAP California Housing Down Payment Assistance Program, and CHFA California Housing Finance Agency. These last two programs are state based and provide almost 100% of the down payment you need for the FHA Loan. USDA and VA don't require any down payment. 

This is just 1 of the homes that are available in San Leandro, Hayward, San Lorenzo and Oakland. THERE IS AN E MAIL LIST AVAILABLE THAT GIVES YOU ALL THE DETAILS OF THE PROGRAM AND THE INSTRUCTIONS TO GET QUALIFIED AS WELL AS PICTURES AND DETAILS OF ALL THE HOUSES. PLEASE TEXT OR E MAIL THE REQUEST WITH YOUR E MAIL ADDRESS SO I CAN SEND THESE TO YOU.

This home in San Leandro is 4 bedrooms 2 bathrooms and 1750 square feet. It has a 1 car attached garage and this is all on a lot that is almost 4,000 square feet. 

There are 50 homes available from $2175-$3400 and the homes are 760-2200 square feet with 1-5 bedrooms. There are also Condominiums and Townhomes that have payments ranging from $1625-$2720 per month with 1-4 bedrooms and 680-1700 square feet. These properties will have a separate Home Owners Association due per month of $200-$430 per month. 

The cost to move into one of the homes will typically be $3,000-$5,000. Your first payment will not be due until 30 days after you move in.

To qualify you must have at least
1. A credit score of 620 or higher (credit karma is a place to check if you aren't sure of your credit score)
2. You will need to prove your income with the last 30 days paystubs and the last 2 years tax returns
3. No Bankruptcy in the last 2 years
4. No Short Sale, or Foreclosure in the last 3 years.

Licensed by the California Department of Real Estate Eric Wexelman

I can respond fastest to texts and e mails as I can't answer calls when I am with my other clients.

listings.title: Studio 2 blocks from UC Berkeley, pets ok, UTILITIES included.

listings.description:
I am looking for one mature and reliable person to live in my adorable studio. There is a private bathroom, pull out love seat, a natural gas fire pit in the yard, a storage shed, a gas grill, and a few fruit trees. There is a kitchenette with a nice double induction burner, blender/food processor, induction kettle, microwave, convection oven, plenty of storage space,and mini-fridge. The room is fully furnished with queen bed, pillows, desk and chair, heater, sheets, towels, and kitchen supplies (including some staples like spices, rice, four, oil, etc). I will even consider letting you use my bike if you are trustworthy. The place is really cute with lots of light. The neighborhood is very quiet. There is a great park 2 blocks away and many groceries, coffee shops, laundromats, bars, and restaurants within walking distance. There is a bus at the end of the street that gets you right onto campus within 15 minutes or you can bike there in 15 minutes. You have a pretty great view of the city from the top of the driveway as this neighborhood is up on a hill. Landlord is fine with guests as long as you let her know.

The move in/out dates are semi-negotiable but you would have to be out by August 21st at the latest. $500 deposit (refundable assuming no damage). Rent includes all utilities. No pets - sorry. 

There are a few odd things about the place. The cottage is a mother-in-law suite - as in: it is in the backyard of the main house where the landlord and her 2 children live. The bathroom that goes with the cottage is connected to the back of the main house. It is a private bathroom with only one entrance from the outside which is about ten steps outside the front door of the cottage. So you have to walk outside to get to the bathroom, but not far, and it is your bathroom alone. Also - there is no sink in the studio so you have to do dishes in the bathroom sink. I have a dish drainer setup in the bathroom and the sink is not prohibitively small. While this is a strange setup, I have never had issues with it at all.

The landlord will want to meet you but other than that you won't interact with her much. You basically have 100% privacy in the unit and backyard and it is nice and quiet.

listings.description:
2057 University Avenue was formerly known as the University Hotel. The University Hotel is no longer in operation and the building has since been converted into an apartment building which offers single room apartments. The building is located on University and Shattuck Avenue. It is located 2 blocks away from the west end of the UC Berkeley Campus. It is a few short blocks away from modes of public transportation such as AC Transit and Bart. The Downtown Berkeley Bart Station connects Berkeley with the greater Bay Area. Bart, which is the Bay Area's Rapid Transit rail system makes it possible to reach destinations such as Downtown San Francisco or the San Francisco International Airport in a matter of minutes. The building is nearby the many eateries, shops, and businesses which make up Downtown Berkeley located on Shattuck Avenue. You will be sharing a common bathroom with all utilities included. Please call Raj Properties at



The room is a single dorm style room with a private bathroom. The room is ideal for a person looking to live a minimalist lifestyle. The room itself is cozy and includes built in wall shelves and a desk and chair. The room also includes a mini refrigerator and a microwave. The room does not have a kitchen sink or stove. The building has a lot of character. Walking through the hallways transports you to another time in Berkeley's history.

*****************************************************************************************************************************************

PLEASE CALL ONLY if your group is composed of every person being a Excellent Housekeeper and an Experienced Tenant with Verifiable References...as to your past experience caring for a residence leased to you.
****************************************************************************************************************************************

***This secluded garden home at 2740 Parker Street is just a 6 to 8 minute pleasant walk to campus going through Berkeley's charming middle class ELMWOOD neighborhood along COLLEGE AVE. Please note that this 1/2 student & 1/2 regular citizen neighborhood has a reputation of a quiet, calm and a family atmosphere less dense than other areas...even though we are just minutes from campus.

*********************************************************************************************************************************
NOTE: Owner is looking for cohesive tenant group who can agree to not have any smoking, loud music and party's with guests invited. You must commit your self to a calm study oriented lifestyle to be considered. Neighbors want respectful behavior.

***The private brown shingle house has been rented for 38 years to CAL STUDENTS...who have said this was their most fun residence at UC. Typically the 5 bedrooms are shared with between 5 to 7 students leasing the quiet home.

***From the wood fence and gate at 2740 Parker walk down the gravel garden path to the sunny rear yard and the English Country Garden Home. Here you can bar-b-que, sun and study in your private yard. 

***Inside ...this very peaceful home is on two levels with four bedrooms on the 2nd floor along with 5 skylights ...you can be yourself here...removed from noise and the general density of Berkeley campus life.

***The very large main floor living room with redwood panel walls, wood floors & a big Yosemite like stone fireplace and many windows that open to the garden ...is the space that was once the Ballet Teaching Studio. The room has high ceilings and a warm almost country feeling. Students sharing this space have often made two or three sub spaces for their study desk or for relaxing. 

***There is also a new kitchen with quartz counters and a dishwasher, disposal, two refrigerators and a new clothes washer and dryer.

listings.description:
Roomy, modern, and well kept apartment. It will become available starting June 1st, and requires a full year lease. It is a 4-unit building, two upstairs and two downstairs.

This building is super convenient to both the Elmwood shopping district, and to UC Berkeley. It is one block north and one block east of the prime shopping area.

4 bedrooms, including a master bedroom with a master bath. The other three bedrooms share a second full bath. Over 1150 square feet! Nice living room, dining area, and kitchen complete the picture. Additional storage shed for bikes or overflow items. 

On-site washer and dryer off the central hallway is shared by the four units.

Central forced air heat in each unit. Tenant pays gas, electricity and water. Landlord pays trash. One parking space in the driveway is included.

Gather your roommates and apply now. Only groups of 5 or less will be considered. No pets, please. 

Every occupant must fill out an application and appear on the lease. Parental co-signers are OK.

Please take a look at the building and neighborhood before requesting a walk-through. Then reply with a short description of your group to request an application. At least one completed application is required in order to schedule a viewing. 

Email:

to receive a rental application .pdf

Thanks for your interest!

***This secluded garden home at 2740 Parker Street is just a 6 to 8 minute pleasant walk to campus going through Berkeley's charming middle class ELMWOOD neighborhood along COLLEGE AVE. Please note that this 1/2 student & 1/2 regular citizen neighborhood has a reputation of a quiet, calm and a family atmosphere less dense than other areas...even though we are just minutes from campus.

*********************************************************************************************************************************
NOTE: Owner is looking for cohesive tenant group who can agree to not have any smoking, loud music and party's with guests invited. You must commit your self to a calm study oriented lifestyle to be considered. Neighbors want respectful behavior.

***IMPORTANT: MEMBERS OF GROUP WANTING TO RENT THIS HOUSE NEED TO HAVE FIRST MONTH RENT SHARE & SECURITY DEPOSIT FUNDS AVAILABLE BY CHECK,CASH OR CASHIERS CHECK WITHIN 24 HOURS.
*******************************************************************************************************************************


***The private brown shingle house has been rented for 38 years to CAL STUDENTS...who have said this was their most fun residence at UC. Typically the 5 bedrooms are shared with between 5 to 7 students leasing the quiet home.

***From the wood fence and gate at 2740 Parker walk down the gravel garden path to the sunny rear yard and the English Country Garden Home. Here you can bar-b-que, sun and study in your private yard. 

***Inside ...this very peaceful home is on two levels with four bedrooms on the 2nd floor along with 5 skylights ...you can be yourself here...removed from noise and the general density of Berkeley campus life.

***The very large main floor living room with redwood panel walls, wood floors & a big Yosemite like stone fireplace and many windows that open to the garden ...is the space that was once the Ballet Teaching Studio. The room has high ceilings and a warm almost country feeling. Students sharing this space have often made two or three sub spaces for their study desk or for relaxing. 

***There is also a new kitchen with quartz counters and a dishwasher, disposal, two refrigerators and a new clothes washer and dryer.


-

***Security Deposit: $ 1,250. each person.

Southshore Gardens Apartments is a gated community with a beautiful courtyard and garden setting. We offer one, two-bedroom apartments and cottage homes. 

A two-bedroom apartment is ready for immediate occupancy!! This unit is upstairs, a corner unit, bright and spacious at approximately 875 Square Feet. In additional to the above, a carport parking and a 9' x 3' x 5' carport storage are available. 

Rent: $2,445 (includes water, sewer & garbage). Tenant pays electricity and gas.

Southshore Gardens Apartments is conveniently located in Alameda, a block from beautiful Crown Memorial Beach and the very popular Alameda Town Centre Shopping Center where you will find almost everything you need. The Transbay Express bus to Mission and First Street in Downtown San Francisco, and buses to Fruitvale BART and the Alameda/Oakland Ferry are a few steps away. Freeway 880 is easily accessible to San Francisco, Oakland, Berkeley and Fremont.

Community features:
* Beautiful Courtyard and Garden Setting
* Community Pool
* On-Site Laundry
* Eco Friendly - Recycling 
* On-Site Management and Maintenance
* Assigned Carport Parking
* Free Storage 

Interior Features:

Come tour our community today.

to schedule for a tour today!

listings.description:
Spacious 2 bed/ 2 Bath Condo is tastefully remodeled with unique touches.

The condo is the largest 2b/2b (1113 Square feet) with the best floor layout (Model F) in the Gate View High-rise Condominiums. This unit is suitable for 2-3 adults and for larger group if agreed the owner may adjust the lease terms accordingly. 
This unit has unobstructed panoramic view of the Bay including Golden Gate Bridge and San Francisco skyline.
The unit is completely remodeled with extensive use of Italian Tile and Granite counters in Kitchen, baths, dining area and all high traffic walkways. Bedrooms and living room are carpeted with high grade Berber carpet with neutral colors. 
All-Electric Kitchen includes Range and Owen, Dishwasher, Frig with icemaker and Microwave Owen. 

Complex Amenities Include: 
One Secure Garage Parking Space. 
24 Hours security guards on duty. 
Heated Swimming Pool. 
Two Tennis Courts.
Gym, Sauna and Jacuzzi. 
Club House for private gatherings. 
Extra and secure storage space for the unit in the basement.
Easy Commute to Berkeley Campus and San Francisco. AC Transit bus stop next to the complex on Pierce street.
El Cerrito Plaza and Solano Avenue shops and restaurant within easy reach.
Ranch99 Asian mall is even closer, within short walking distance. 
Albany has the best school district in the area! 

The Monthly rent includes: 
Free water (Hot and Cold). 
Garbage service. 
Free Cable TV Service.
Free Electricity is also included in the rent (Up to $75 pr month). The amounts in excess of $75 will be paid by Tenants. 
One Car Garage space.
Access to Units Storage Space in the Basement. 
Pets: No Dogs! Cat allowed with additional Deposit.

Rental Agreement: 
Rent is 3000/Month. 
Refundable Security and Cleaning Deposit is $3000. 
A yearly Lease is preferred. Shorter times may be considered. 
One time $300 (move-in/move-out) fee that goes to Gateview Home Owner's Association. 
Total cash at start of Lease =1st month rent + Deposit + MI Fee= $6300.
Good Credit, Evidence of Income is required. References may be required.
No Smoking, No Pets Please! 

Contact Information: 
To Visit he unit or ask any additional question please contact Dr. Bahram Mosaddad at

I am planning to set up an open house period this weekend. Time TBD.

Fully furnished and nice apartment for rent! We are moving out in mid-May (flexible) and are looking for someone to take over our lease until August 8th; monthly rent is $3280. The apartment fits 4 people, which makes it a total of $820 per person. There is an option to extend the lease for one year, and the monthly rent from August 8th will be $3570 (this rent also includes a parking spot in the garage and extra storage place). We are throwing in the furniture for free since we are returning to our home country and are no longer in need of them.

The apartment is at 2110 Haste Street (Fine Arts Building) close to Shattuck, with a very central location. 5-10 minutes walk from Downtown Berkeley Bart station and 5-10 minutes walk to campus. It has 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, living room and kitchen, and also 2 small storage rooms. It includes 4 beds, 2 dressers, a sofa, chairs, tables and kitchen equipment. Laundry room is located at each floor. The building has a sweet rooftop with a San Francisco view. Movie of apt: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S9ZchX03UWI 

WIFI and cable is included. Other utilities such as water, sewer, garbage, gas and PGE is about 130 dollars each month. Deposit is 600 dollars (in total for the apartment).

We will be happy to answer any questions you may have. Please contact us in either telephone or email.

listings.title: **2 bed/1bath mid century modern house for rent $3500/month**

listings.description:
Located in the up-and-coming West Oakland Arts and Crafts District, this 1907 vintage, TWO-bedroom/one bath, UPSTAIRS apartment offers nine-foot high ceilings, BRAND NEW fresh white paint and wall-to-wall, BRAND NEW short-pile, industrial taupe carpeting. 

It is in a freestanding building with four identical two-bedroom apartments, two upstairs and two downstairs. Street parking is easy and ample. 

(IF YOU SEE THIS POSTING, THE APARTMENT IS STILL AVAILABLE. IT WILL NOT BE RENTED UNTIL THE CONCLUSION OF THE OPEN-HOUSE ON SUNDAY, MARCH 6, FROM 11:00AM-1:00 PM ------ I'M SORRY, I AM NOT AVAILABLE TO SHOW THE UNIT BEFORE THE OPEN-HOUSE ON SUNDAY) 

We've completely renovated the kitchen with a BRAND NEW refrigerator, BRAND-NEW over-the-stove microwave, BRAND NEW kitchen cabinets and BRAND NEW kitchen sink and faucet. 

The bathroom has also been COMPLETELY RENOVATED with a BRAND NEW toilet, BRAND NEW bathtub/shower, and BRAND NEW European-style bathroom sink fixture. The bathroom also offers BRAND NEW cabinets and BRAND NEW floor tile. 

There is a nice laundry room on the premises with a coin-op washer and dryer. 

There is a cute, beautifully landscaped backyard with a patio for hanging out, BBQing or entertaining. Each of the four units also gets it's own weather-tight outdoor storage locker, located in the backyard. 

The yard is completely enclosed and fenced to keep intruders out and pets from wandering off. It is a pooch paradise! There is a redwood community table that seats up to 10 for a dinner party. . . If you like to garden, there is an area for you to plant vegetables or flowers...

Located just off West Grand Ave. near Adeline, this building is literally a five-minute, straight-shot drive to the Bay Bridge tollbooth!!! It's a five-minute drive to 880 and 580 onramps. 10 minutes to Emeryville, Berkeley or Downtown Oakland. Ten minutes to Ikea, Trader Joe's, Safeway Pak-And-Save, Nordstrom Rack, Bay Street Mall, Home Depot, Lanesplitter Pizza, Target, Best Buy! Very central and convenient... 

The neighborhood is mixed-use with lofts, warehouses, art-spaces and various industrial workshops, etc. There are also lots of old Victorian houses in various stages of rehab, some gorgeous and some run-down. There is a new charter school (Vincent Academy) 1/2 block away. 

Crime in this neighborhood is mostly a thing of the past, with West Oakland's serious revitalization program underway. New development and creative people are flooding in from Berkeley and San Francisco and have turned this area into a neighborhood for artists, musicians and craftspersons. However it IS an urban neighborhood and can get very noisy sometimes... It's not Piedmont! Locals are sometimes hanging out on the corner, socializing and playing music. It can be like Mardi Gras at times. If you crave quiet and serenity, this may not be the neighborhood for you. It is a VERY friendly neighborhood, but can sometimes be noisy in the daytimes.

The building has a security fence around the perimeter, a security gate at the front entry door and each of the four apartment doors are individually gated, so tenants are SUPER SAFE. We have never had a break-in, or any problem with crime in this building. Nobody has ever been hassled in the 8 years I've owned this building. The neighbors are nice.

A cat or nice dog MAY be OK with a reasonable pet deposit. (Deposit amount dependent on the pet) 

The apartment rent is $1800/month. SORRY, NO SECTION 8 ACCEPTED. 

$1800 refundable security deposit to move in. One UPSTAIRS apartment is available NOW! 

Tenant pays PGE gas and electric. Owner pays water and trash. 

I'll be showing the apartment SUNDAY, March 6, FROM 11:00am - 1:00PM

Please come by during those hours to view the place and meet me... The address is 1084 24th St. Oakland CA 94607. (Major cross-streets are West Grand and Adeline) 

Applications will be available at the time of the showing, or you may bring a renters resume. Pay stubs and/or credit reports are also welcome, but not mandatory for consideration.

THANKS

jeff

listings.description:
Welcome To Higby

Built In 2015.

A refined living experience in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley. With modern apartments and inviting common areas, Higby creates a place that is both home and a gathering space. Within walking distance to craft breweries, celebrated restaurants, organic markets and cultural highlights, Higby celebrated exploration and adventure. 

Higby offers studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley

Modern building amenities include: 
•	Lobby with lounge seating and TV
•	Courtyard with a bocce ball court
•	Roof deck with a barbecue, fire pit, lounge seating and city views
•	Fitness studio
•	Indoor bike storage and work stand
•	Enclosed residential parking garage

Apartment units feature: 
•	Electric ovens
•	Gas range cooktops
•	Dishwashers
•	Washers and dryers

Higby is designed to operate 25% more efficiently than a code-compliant building. Sustainability highlights contributing to Higby's LEED Gold certification include:
•	Locally sourced and recycle content materials
•	Non-toxic finishes and a building-wide green cleaning program
•	Aggressive construction waste recycling program
•	Native, adaptive plantings to reduce water consumption
•	On-site planters to detain and manage storm water 

So Stretch out. Entertain. Sleep it off. Celebrate pajama day. Declare a lost weekend. Take a conference call from home. Do what you do. Live At Higby.

listings.description:
- Walk to school, BART, shopping and nightlife

- Professionally managed

- Open, spacious, and sunny

- One standard bedroom and one large living room which has closing doors and a LARGE walk-in closet

- Newly renovated kitchen with granite counters and tile floor

- All new paint throughout
- New ceiling fans in living room and bedroom

- Pristine original hardwood floors

- Tall ceilings

- Water, garbage, hot water & room heat all paid, low electricity bills

- Laundry facilities on site

- Range & refrigerator included



One year lease

$2,685 security deposit

Sorry, no pets
No subletting


The next showings will be at:
12:00pm sharp on Saturday, March 4th
and 3:00pm sharp on Sunday, March 5thAt 2491 Ellsworth Street in Berkeley 
It's a locking building, so I will meet you out front and take you up at the showing time. Anyone who arrives after that will unfortunately miss the showing


Applications are paper or pdf only, available at the end of the viewing.
All applicants over 18 need to fill out an application and provide a $40 application fee in cashier's check or money order payable to Picardo Arms Apartments.There is a $100 holding deposit. We only process one person's or one set of roommates' applications at a time. The deposit takes the apartment off the market and is refundable for up to three business days. After that, it's non-refundable. Bring all of your documents at the same time, and we process your application well within the three days. If you pass, the deposit becomes the first $100 of your security deposit. If you don't pass, even if your application is processed after the three business days, we return the $100 to you. The $40 application fees are non-refundable once the applications are processed regardless of the result.Applicants must show combined income of at least 3x the rent amount per month gross (pre-tax) and good credit based in the U.S. If credit and income aren't met (and the applicant does not have overly poor credit) then a cosigner may be used. A cosigner applies in the same way with another $40 application fee. A copy of a passport or driver's license and proof of income is required for each application. Proof of income can be in the form of two recent pay stubs, social security checks, pension, trust fund or support checks, or tax returns.
Note for new international residents: if you don't have a credit history in the U.S. because of your national status, you may be exempt from the credit requirement; however, you will still need to meet the income requirement and will be required to pay an increased security desposit.
All fees and charges, including move in fees, must be in the form of cashier's check or money order, payable to Picardo Arms. Once you are a tenant, from your 2nd month onward, you may pay by personal check.

listings.title: 1122 U Spring/ Summer Specials

listings.description:
This one bedroom apartment is a cozy, quiet escape from the busyness of Berkeley. With high vaulted wood beam ceilings, a skylight, and a small wood-burning fireplace, this residence feels like a cabin. It has one spacious bedroom (including two large closets), one bathroom, a large living room, and a charming kitchen, making this apartment perfect for one resident. The apartment itself is tucked off the street, mitigating traffic noise. It has a small side yard, and is surrounded by large trees (redwoods) which keep the apartment cool through the summer. Its location is just off Ashby Ave, right near it's intersection with College Ave. It is close to public transportation, with the 51B stop at College and Ashby being on the same block. Also, as it is right off of College Ave, this apartment is no more than a five minute walk from a bakery, Elmwood Cafe, Ici's, La Med, and other great restaurants and small businesses.

Per the landlord's request, this is a non-smoking apartment, with no pets allowed.

I will be showing the place Friday (March 4th) from 11:30am - 2pm, or Sunday (March 6th) from 3pm-5pm. Please feel free to email me to let me know you are coming, and I will send you the address. When you get here, the apartment is tucked behind a large wood-shingled house. Just walk down the driveway (the driveway to the left of the house if you are facing it) and once you see the carport, turn right. The apartment door will be open. 

*note - due to high interest in the property, I am only able to respond via email. Please check your spam folder if you have not yet received a response*

This 680 sf condo is located on 2nd floor (top floor) and is an end unit. Has its own patio that I normally open the door to enjoy the nice breeze from near by tree.

*Very quiet and lots of privacy, both in bedroom and living room.
*Bright with natural light, Spacious, wood floor in living room, carpeted bedroom, marble floor bathroom, vaulted ceiling.
*laundry washer dryer in unit.
*2 min drive to literally everything; Safeway, Marina and Ranch99 supermarket, jamba juice, starbucks, Ross, BOA WellsFargo, Chase, HSBC, UPS, Fedex, post office, and all the restaurants in warm springs Fremont.
*2min drive to get to 880, 680, 5 min to milpitas and 237.
*2min walk to park, tennis, basketball court, running trail.

listings.description:
CABIN IN WOODS
artistic, poetic, funky, unique.
The cabin is a large studio with apprx. 550 sq ft. a small balcony overlooks the canyon of Sausal Creek, and its winter creek. The living area has french doors leading to the balcony as well as a wall of windows through which the acacias and oak trees are visible. Off the living area is the kitchen with cement counter tops and a gas stove and full size refrigerator with lower freezer compartment. To the right of the entry is a small hallway leading to a walk in closet and tiled bathroom with redwood shower stall. The floor is a composite wood shearing material (OSB)... Parking is off-street and an on-site laundry room.
The cabin is located behind a brown shingle duplex 4674 Dolores Ave. Oakland 94602. Face the duplex and walk down the driveway on the left and through a wooden gate, continue down the path to cabin. Dolores is a quiet street one block long which intersects Park Blvd. Park Blvd has direct bus lines to SF and informal commute stops as well as transport to downtown Oakland and Berkeley. 
A short walk to Glenview Shopping Center (coffee bar, restaurants, grocery store, dentist, etc) Close to Montclair Golf Course and Driving Range. Walk to Dimond Recreation Center and Lions Pool -- year round out-door heated pool . Close to Farmer Joes and Montclair Shopping area for major grocery and retail stores. Minutes from the Park exit off either Hwy 13 coming from Berkeley and Walnut Creek and the 580 Freeway from S.F. or Oakland
Viewings this weekend March 12 Saturday from 1-4 pm and March 13 Sunday (remember Daylight Savings) 1-4pm. Additional viewing can be arranged next week during weekdays if you email me and give me some time to arrange. Available on April 15 (perhaps before). Please email me for questions but if the information is contained in this ad I wont answer so read whole ad before emailing, Dogs and cats Ok. Do not walk around the property or disturb other tenants, just remember to walk down the driveway through the wood gate on the path which leads to the cabin. Stay in this area only. listings.description:
Welcome To Higby

Built In 2015.

A refined living experience in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley. With modern apartments and inviting common areas, Higby creates a place that is both home and a gathering space. Within walking distance to craft breweries, celebrated restaurants, organic markets and cultural highlights, Higby celebrated exploration and adventure. 

Higby offers studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley

Modern building amenities include: 
•	Lobby with lounge seating and TV
•	Courtyard with a bocce ball court
•	Roof deck with a barbecue, fire pit, lounge seating and city views
•	Fitness studio
•	Indoor bike storage and work stand
•	Enclosed residential parking garage

Apartment units feature: 
•	Electric ovens
•	Gas range cooktops
•	Dishwashers
•	Washers and dryers

Higby is designed to operate 25% more efficiently than a code-compliant building. Sustainability highlights contributing to Higby's LEED Gold certification include:
•	Locally sourced and recycle content materials
•	Non-toxic finishes and a building-wide green cleaning program
•	Aggressive construction waste recycling program
•	Native, adaptive plantings to reduce water consumption
•	On-site planters to detain and manage storm water 

So Stretch out. Entertain. Sleep it off. Celebrate pajama day. Declare a lost weekend. Take a conference call from home. Do what you do. Live At Higby.


Office Hours
Monday 9am - 6pm
Tuesday 9am - 6pm
Wednesday 9am - 6pm
Thursday 9am - 6pm
Friday 9am - 6pm
Saturday 10am - 5pm
Sunday 10am - 5pm

3015 SAN PABLO AVE, Berkeley, CA 94702

Contact us



www.livehigby.com

listings.description:
Are you part of a group, and looking for a gorgeous house right near UC Berkeley, in the most yummy part of town -- in the northside gourmet ghetto?

For more than 10 years, our house has been hosting groups of undergrads and grad students. Everyone who has lived here has loved it. Your group, will too!

This house is fully furnished with a total of 20 beds within 7 bedrooms.

Your group of up to 20 can rent the entire house, or, you can rent a block of beds.

The house is open for move-in August 15 2016. We also have availabilities during the summer for anyone who needs summer accommodations.

House Features and Details You'll Appreciate. . .
- Awesome 170 meg download internet! This house is ultra wired and ready to roll!
- 7 bedrooms: 1 Single, 2 Doubles, 2 Triples, and 2 Quads, all are furnished.
- The rooms are quite large with fantastic views, big windows, sunlight. Most rooms have twin beds, the single has a full bed.
- Huge living/dining room & kitchen fully equipped with everything you'll need to cook, 3 refrigerators
- Big-Screen HDTV, 2 printers, NEST smart thermostats so you can easily monitor heating usage in winter
- Washer/dryer, dishwasher, up to date appliances
- So close to campus, you can walk in 5 to 15 minutes depending where you're going.
- Perfect Location in the Gourmet Ghetto.... Berkeley's finest restaurants, a drugstore just down the block, multiple grocery stores & farmer's markets
- Redwood deck in the back is the perfect place to hang out in the sun, study, have a get-together, BBQ
- Green electricity from solar panels, numerous other ecological house features

Rental Price
Important Note -- The rental price listed, $1699, is the average cost per person per month if you book in advance and you are part of a group. Multiply that number by the number of people in your group to get the total cost per month. The price may be higher or lower depending on size of group, send us an application for further details. Utilities cost is an average of 100 per person per month. 

Want to See More Photos & a Video?
Email us for way more photos plus a video tour of the house.

How To Apply
Please email us and we'll respond with details on how to apply.

Thanks, we look forward to meeting you soon. And... GO BEARS!
