This lovely cottage has a flexible floor plan and can be set up with two separate bedrooms, each with their own entrance, living areas, closets and and equal access to the private kitchen and bathroom and living room/dining room. Alternatively, it can be used as a 1 bedroom with separate living and dining rooms.


Available June 1, a beautiful large two bedroom cottage in charming Normandy Village, a Berkeley Landmark one half block north of the University of California on quiet, residential Spruce St.


Resembling the quaint villages of provincial France, Normandy Village is delightful and a short walk to the UC campus, downtown Berkeley, public transportation, BART and the "Gourmet Ghetto" restaurants and shops. Great tranquil setting on a large, sunny, park like property with open space, trees and gardens.


The product of inspired architecture and craftsmanship. You will find many quality features inside and outside the building including high cathedral ceiling, lovely hardwood floors, antique brick fireplace, heavy solid wood doors, redwood paneling and trim with hand carved details and ironwork.


This flat will be furnished to suit your needs.


Available starting June 1, a large two bedroom flat for $3000 per month with year lease. Please call for details.

Welcome To Higby

Built In 2015.

A refined living experience in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley. With modern apartments and inviting common areas, Higby creates a place that is both home and a gathering space. Within walking distance to craft breweries, celebrated restaurants, organic markets and cultural highlights, Higby celebrated exploration and adventure. 

Higby offers studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley

Modern building amenities include: 
•	Lobby with lounge seating and TV
•	Courtyard with a bocce ball court
•	Roof deck with a barbecue, fire pit, lounge seating and city views
•	Fitness studio
•	Indoor bike storage and work stand
•	Enclosed residential parking garage

Apartment units feature: 
•	Electric ovens
•	Gas range cooktops
•	Dishwashers
•	Washers and dryers

Higby is designed to operate 25% more efficiently than a code-compliant building. Sustainability highlights contributing to Higby's LEED Gold certification include:
•	Locally sourced and recycle content materials
•	Non-toxic finishes and a building-wide green cleaning program
•	Aggressive construction waste recycling program
•	Native, adaptive plantings to reduce water consumption
•	On-site planters to detain and manage storm water 

So Stretch out. Entertain. Sleep it off. Celebrate pajama day. Declare a lost weekend. Take a conference call from home. Do what you do. Live At Higby.


Office Hours
Monday 9am - 6pm
Tuesday 9am - 6pm

Sunday 10am - 5pm

3015 SAN PABLO AVE, Berkeley, CA 94702

Welcome To Higby

Built In 2015.

A refined living experience in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley. With modern apartments and inviting common areas, Higby creates a place that is both home and a gathering space. Within walking distance to craft breweries, celebrated restaurants, organic markets and cultural highlights, Higby celebrated exploration and adventure. 

Higby offers studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley

Modern building amenities include: 
•	Lobby with lounge seating and TV
•	Courtyard with a bocce ball court

•	Fitness studio

Apartment units feature: 
•	Electric ovens
•	Gas range cooktops
•	Dishwashers
•	Washers and dryers

Higby is designed to operate 25% more efficiently than a code-compliant building. Sustainability highlights contributing to Higby's LEED Gold certification include:

•	Non-toxic finishes and a building-wide green cleaning program
•	Aggressive construction waste recycling program
•	Native, adaptive plantings to reduce water consumption
•	On-site planters to detain and manage storm water 

So Stretch out. Entertain. Sleep it off. Celebrate pajama day. Declare a lost weekend. Take a conference call from home. Do what you do. Live At Higby.

This unit consists of the upper 2 floors of a 3 story home.
- Lower floor of this unit has a complete 1 bedroom unit with kitchen/dinning area and a full bath with washer/dryer.
- Upper floor of this unit has a large, open, 14'x30' north-facing studio, windows on 3 sides, a 10'x12' skylight in the middle of a vaulted ceiling. It also has a full bath, a 8'x10' roof terrace and a coffee bar with sink in the studio area.
This floor was conceived as a studio/office/professional-practice space and it can also be used as a separate studio work/living area. 

This unit has it's own entrance, own mail box and a reserved parking space. Cat and small dog are welcome subject to owner approval.

Owner is a retired architect who design and built this home for himself 8 years ago. He lives on the ground floor.

Monthly rent for this unit is $3,600 plus 50% of the shared utility costs (with owner), $250 per month. The utility package includes gas/electricity, water, waste collection and a high-end Comcast package. The package includes super fast internet connection with WIFI availability throughout the unit and its terrace, HD Cable TV and DVR.
Location of this home is at the center of Emeryville, Berkeley, Piedmont and Oakland. Water front and freeway access is multiple and immediate and it takes 20 minutes to meet for lunch at SFMOMA, or to leave your car at McArthur BART, hop on and . . .. . ...

listings.description:
Crockett is a safe, friendly, small town, with a well-established artist's community. Nestled in green hills on the banks of the Carquinez Straits you have easy access to I-80; non commute time it takes just 15 minutes to Berkeley or BART. Or catch the ferry in Vallejo to San Francisco, 5 minutes away over the Carquinez Bridge.

This one bedroom apartment (top left) has a wonderful water view; and is available now. It is one of three self-contained apartments in this genuine Cape Cod building with a private entrance via an external flight of stairs. Behind the building there's a large un-fenced garden available for tenants (if you love gardening, and want to grow your own veggies, this is the place for you)! 

The apartment has brand new carpet and freshly painted throughout. Natural gas heating and cooking. The bedroom looks out on the garden and has a small built in closet. The bathroom has a claw foot tub and shower combo. There's a small breakfast bar in the kitchen. The living room has full water view; a small storage room; and an alcove wired for internet, ideal for laptop home office set up. All this adds up to 650 sq. ft. of sunny space in total.

We are looking for a mature, long term tenant to make this home. Someone with good rental references. A non-smoker and pet free person who will fit in well with our existing tenants who are respectful professionals; responsible, quiet and easy going. 

Rent is $1,450 per month. Deposit is $1,450. Total move in cost is $2,900 (deposit and first month's rent). A non-refundable application processing fee of $35 is payable at the time of submitting your completed and signed application. We ask you to bring a CA ID and proof of income at this time also. 

Email Lindsay with your contact phone number for more details and arrange a viewing.

This luxurious 3300 sq. ft. 2 story fully furnished home was built in 2005 in a quiet well maintained neighborhood in Alameda and offer luxury living with a modern style. It is located in a quiet area with private streets and private security patrol. The living room has a unique and specially designed gas burning stone fireplace and attached to it is a Golden Eagle carved out of solid redwood with its wings stretched out as the mantle. New Victorian style banisters made of real Maplewood was installed on the staircase. The folio has marble tile floors and leads into the large family room with beautiful hardwood floors. The family room has a modern style rug that helps as a decoration and also keep the room warm. The house has an open floor plan with modern architecture which is great for entertaining. The home has a very large kitchen with a rear type granite countertops, a large island, stainless steel appliances, two ovens, dishwasher, built-in microwave oven, a pantry and trash compactor.
There are 4 bedrooms and 2 baths upstairs; The master bedroom is very large 15ft by 30ft. with a master bath and Jacuzzi tub, also the laundry room. There is a downstairs bedroom with its own private bath. The house is fully furnished with modern style and comfort.
There is easy access to I-80 freeway to Oakland, Piedmont, Berkeley, San Francisco, Emeryville, Walnut Creek, San Jose, Livermore, Pleasanton, Dublin,Hayward and Richmond.

Newly remodeled 2 Bedroom and 2 Bathroom unit available now! Enjoy this spacious home that boasts a grand backyard serving as a green oasis with a bountiful avocado tree.

The home is in the highly-sought after North Oakland, Berkeley, Emeryville (NOBE) area. It's a commuter's location since it's a short 2 blocks from the MacArthur Bart and just minutes away from the I-580 and I-880 highways. 
Walkscore - 79, Bikescore - 90, Transitscore - 73

Location & Community Details
- Close to cafes, local eateries, and they're all walking distance
- Easy access to SF & Silicon Valley (580, 80 & 24)
- Free Emeryville Bus Shuttle to BART within walking distance (2-3 few blocks)
- Close to Bay Street Shopping & IKEA

About the Unit
- New Stainless Steel Appliances including a new W/D
- Granite Counter Tops
- New flooring, lighting, blinds, fixtures throughout the bedrooms and bathrooms
- Private Entrance and Exit-way
- Dedicated Parking and Off-street Parking
- Gated, spacious Backyard that you can make your own
- Minutes to Bart

About You
- Section 8 is NOT considered for this property
- Minimum credit score of 670
- Responsible, clean, and professional with rental/housing references (2 adults preferred, but no more than 4 to the unit; family okay)
- Can show proof of income and submit to background/criminal investigation; LinkedIn profiles welcome
- Pet-free, smoke-free, and drug-free
- No subletting
- Able to sign at least 12-month lease 
- Able to provide security deposit (equivalent to rent) + first months rent (upon moving in)

Details
- 2 Bedrooms / 2 Bathrooms (1 Master Bedroom w/ En Suite Bathroom)
- Sq Ft - ~1,000 sq ft
- Split this 2 BD/2 BA and pay ~$1,800 per person


Rental Terms
- Rent: $3,550
- Garbage included. Tenant(s) pay utilities, gas, electric, and water. 
- Duration: 13 months (longer duration available)
- Available: March 14, 2016
- Application Fee: $40
- Security Deposit: $3,550
- Move-in: Application, First Month's Rent, and Security Deposit

In a quiet neighborhood. The property offers a ton of 
privacy with neighbors set back from the property lines. 
Has a newly remodeled kitchen and 
updated bathrooms. It's ideally located within the Kensington 
school district, and is walking distance to Kensington 
Village and Blake's Garden. Also close to BART for easy commute 
to SF, and is 15 minutes from UC Berkeley. 
Available immediately.

listings.title: Fabulous sun filled El Cerrito house

listings.description:
Beautifully renovated, sunny, 2++ bedroom, 2 bath, single-family home with 3 bonus rooms. 
Available April 1, 2016

See photos at http://www.2419curtis.shutterfly.com 

Kitchen with granite counters, dishwasher, stainless steel cooking range and refrigerator. 
Luxurious Radiant heating and hardwood floors is great for people with allergies and pulmonary problems 
Charming bathroom with skylight, granite counters, and more 
Living room with built-in bookshelves and fireplace 
Huge sunny backyard and peaceful garden with lawn, rosebushes, fruit trees, birds and flowers all year round. 6 foot tall, 3 tier, Mediterranean water fountain to soothe you as you enjoy the garden.

Energy-efficient new windows and insulated ceiling and walls 
Large bonus rooms in the basement with plenty of light - great for office, guest room, media room, playroom, etc. 
Cable and phone hookups in every room 
Washer and dryer, one car garage, and one off street parking space in driveway 

Close to elementary schools - Black Pine Circle, Berkeley Montessori, Ecole Bilangue and Rosa Parks Elementary.

One half block from the AC Transit Busline, 2 blocks to various San Pablo bus lines 
About 5 minutes by car or bike to: North Berkeley BART, New Berkeley Bowl, Interstate 80, UC Berkeley, Aquatic Park (great for kids!) or the Berkeley Marina 

Less than 2 minute walk to Long Branch, Paisan and CafeTrieste (live music several nights each week), in the heart of Berkeley's new Bohemia. 

Rent is $4200 per month. Text

to setup an appointment to see the house. 

Non-smokers only. Pet's negotiable. Tenant pays garden care, garbage and utilities. One year lease.
listings.title: Beautiful, Remodeled Sunny Home

listings.description:

About the unit: 
• Great location, close to all transportation; buses, convenient freeway access and 5 mins walk to Ashby BART
• Very quiet street with easier parking than most of Berkeley
• Hardwood floor throughout.

• Porcelain tiles in kitchen and bathroom.

Non smoking building. Sorry, no pets.

listings.description: Exclusive living at its best. Spectacular single family home located on the desirable neighborhood of Berkeley. This 865 sqft. property offers a cozy 2 bedrooms and 1 bath, comes with a good sized living room which is great for entertaining guests, inviting patio with bright light, and has additional storage space. Also comes with classy hardwood floor and double paned windows thoughout. Central A/C-heating, in-unit washer and dryer connection and cable ready, and high speed internet. One car garage attached. Cats and dogs are welcome. This house is conveniently located in the middle of everything. Nearby West-bank Berkeley, close to fine restaurants, shopping centers, and lovely gardens.

listings.description:
We are looking for a roommate for the living room in a two-bedroom apt in downtown Berkeley. 

The move-in date is immediate.
The lease ends by late July or early August, 2016. Long-term is possible after move-in.

You will be living with two girls. I'm an undergrad majored in Psychology. My roommate works at SF, and she's only home during nights/weekends. We prefer UC Berkeley affiliated students, scholars and faculty. We also prefer same gender roommate.

The location is on 2020 Kittredge St, Berkeley. The property is professionally managed by Library Gardens. The place is right next to Downtown Berkeley Bart Station, and Target, Walgreens, Starbucks, Bank of America and many many restaurants. 


The living-room is now for rent: $870/month with about $30 utility (wifi included)

The apartment building is really new and has all the facilities you need. We also keep the apartment very clean and nice. 
- Living room has windows with great light source
- Free WIFI
- Well furnished, secured gate, laundry on the same floor
- The kitchen has everything, oven, microwave, dishwasher and fridge.
- You can get a room divider to ensure privacy
- Quiet living environment
- Parking garage available at $135/month

Email me if you're interested with questions, a little bit background information and move-in date.


Thanks!

listings.description:
Bright, quiet and spacious second floor walk-up Studio Apartment above retail store. With a main room (13' x 18') and high ceiling (8 feet and 4 inches), this hardwood floor Studio has a bathroom with tiled flooring and wainscoting and floor-to-ceiling shower tiles plus remodeled kitchen to one side. The ground-floor was built as a grand theater with reinforced concrete walls and the charming apartments used to house the visiting artists. So, no one lives below or above this 8-unit apartment building. 

One year lease is desirable and one month rent plus equivalent security deposit are needed for move-in. There is resident-dedicated parking rental available, but not included in the rent.

FEATURES:

♦ Large fridge, Italian gas stove, and gas-fired space heater

♦ Bathroom w/new toilet, tiled floor to ceiling (shower stall only- no tub)

Large studio apartment in an absolutely ideal location. In a canyon overlooking the creek, secluded in a forest of oak and bay trees with an array of birds and wildlife. 

On a very small and quiet street, the apartment is 2 blocks from the Kensington Village, where there is a bus stop (including Transbay to SF) as well as a grocery, cafe, restaurants, etc. Wonderful, friendly neighborhood which is a very short drive to UC and downtown Berkeley, and El Cerrito Plaza BART. 

This is the lower unit of a duplex. The house is in a canyon, and there is a walk-down of 60+ steps which will give you a workout every day.

There is a spacious, separate kitchen. The main room has rustic charm and includes an alcove. Please note that the fireplace is sealed and inoperable, and burning is not possible. 

Unfurnished. No Smoking. Rent includes water (including hot water), garbage, laundry. Available early April (exact date TBD)

listings.description:
Newly renovated just for you! This 1930s house with an expansive wrap-around garden and Bay views has been updated and is ready for you to call home! Full of period charm, with a Wedgewood stove, wood-burning fireplace, cathedral ceiling, breakfast nook, and hardwood floors. You will be walking distance to the coveted Kensington Hilltop Elementary School, as well as the very beautiful Tilden Park, and many local independent stores and services. A great community for families. 

Kensington Hilltop School is rated a "10" by Greatschools.org and has many enrichment programs like computer lab, library, art, and music. These are parent-funded and are classes that are not generally funded by the State of California: 
https://www.kensingtonhilltop.org/academics/kef-enrichment-programs/

The school is served by a great local community that offers additional after-school enrichment classes including music, art, cooking, carpentry, Legos, dance, critters, etc:
https://www.kensingtonhilltop.org/after-school-resources/kasep/

Biweekly house cleaning and landscape maintenance are included in your rent. Available for long term lease.

Easy commute to UC Berkeley and LBL. Daily commuter bus into San Francisco just one block away. 

UPGRADES AND RENOVATIONS MADE IN THE PAST YEAR:
Newly painted, inside and out 
New driveway and sidewalk
Textured granite kitchen counter space
Premium carved granite farm-style sink
Reverse osmosis water filter
Refinished cabinets with soft-close drawers
Marmoleum kitchen floor
Updated second bathroom with stylish marble counter top vanity and modern subway tiles
Frameless shower doors (on order)
High security deadbolts on exterior doors
Attic insulation
New Gutters

HOME FEATURES:
Generously sized living room, dining room, and master bedroom (with walk-in closet)
Every room on the main floor has bay views
Lots of windows, even in some of the closets
Shower stalls with lights and fans
Dual pane windows on the main floor
Large one car garage/workshop
Carpeted storage or workout room
More storage with built in shelves in the crawl space
Bonus room that can be a 4th b/room or office
Private back yard with deck for entertaining, plus kids' play structure and grassy area
Pear tree and blueberry bushes
Laundry room with washer & dryer
Au pair suite with separate entrance and private bathroom

Available for private viewing now. Please call Scott @
listings.title: Remodeled, Spacious & Sunny Kensington Hills home w/Bonus Rooms

listings.description:
Coming down the private driveway you feel like you are a million miles from the city and entering Tilden
Park! The level in entry invites you in and you are greeted with spectacular canyon views upon
entering this serene home. Situated on over a half an acre it is level-in with nearly level living.
The home features two "wings" connected by a windowed hallway bringing views, nature and light in.
The living area to the left and bedrooms to the right offers wonderful separation of spaces.
The living area is a fantastic "great room" with walls of windows showcasing the views. With access
to both indoors and outdoors. Enjoy watching the wildlife around you, al fresco dining, or gathering
for a fun and games around the wood burning stove. The den off the kitchen has an exterior door
and is ideal for a family room, office or even as a fifth bedroom. Also on the main level is a generous
master suite with its own private deck area, two additional bedrooms and a second full bathroom.

The lower level features another large bedroom, full bath, & laundry area , that can easily be converted to an Au'pair unit with private entrance.
The Separate large Home Office also features an exterior access. 
2 car Garage with additional off street parking for up to ~8 guests cars complete the picture. 

You are surrounded by amazing views, abundant nature and glimpses of
various wonderful wildlife. This is a special, nurturing place, located just minutes to Solano Avenue,
U.C Berkeley Campus, & North Berkeley BART. There is even a bus line that is just a few blocks away.
The Tilden Park "Olde school path" trail, a wondrous Nature path for walkers , Starts next to your home's private driveway

listings.description:
Newly listed charming craftsman style bungalow located in Elmwood/ Claremont area at 2947A Pine Avenue. This two story one bedroom cottage has hardwood floors throughout as well as lots of windows and is filled with beautiful details such as original wainscoting and plenty of built in craftsman-style storage. The bungalow is in a quiet residential tree-lined area that allows for privacy and is close to major shopping and eateries on College. This is a low maintenance landscaped, must-see property filled with original charm. 
Originally built in 1920, this property has been newly renovated for all modern conveniences. To the left of the porch and living room is a quaint seating area and dining space with built in storage as well as a newly renovated kitchen and separate laundry room complete with new washer and dryer and more additional storage. The open beamed kitchen has new cabinets, stainless steel refrigerator and a vintage stove for your convenience.
The original wooden staircase leads to a hallway with a large bedroom on the left with walk --in closet and adjacent private outdoor balcony. There is a large full bath with dual shower and tub combination, Carrera marble counter and new fixtures. Also adjoining the bedroom/bathroom is an extra room that could be used as a home office, sitting room or den. 
Being just a short walk to Rockridge Bart, this property is a conveniently located to almost anywhere in the San Francisco Bay Area. Located 3 blocks north of College Avenue, this property is close to the post office, major banking, shopping, restaurants, and parks. Nearby markets include a newly expanded Safeway, Whole Foods, Trader Joes, and Oliveto Market Hall. Close distance to shopping, many upscale boutiques, Rialto Cinemas, and restaurants including: Wood Tavern, Trattoria La Siciliana, Zachary's. Also, nearby are many coffee shops are also in the near vicinity; Elmwood Café, Cole Coffee, Peet's and Philz Coffee.
Prominent features include:
*Natural wood, refinished hardwood floors and original wainscoting throughout
*Modern appliances and grounded electrical outlets
*New GE stainless steel refrigerator and full size washer dryer on property
*Office space or extra room
*Central Heating 
*Washer and dryer in unit
*Lots of space for storage
*Large windows complete with window treatments for plenty of lighting
*Centrally located to all freeways to greater SF Bay Area, Highway 24, 580 and 13
*With a walk score of 86 this location is very walk/bike friendly.

listings.description:
Welcome To Higby

Built In 2015.

A refined living experience in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley. With modern apartments and inviting common areas, Higby creates a place that is both home and a gathering space. Within walking distance to craft breweries, celebrated restaurants, organic markets and cultural highlights, Higby celebrated exploration and adventure. 

Higby offers studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley

Modern building amenities include: 
•	Lobby with lounge seating and TV
•	Courtyard with a bocce ball court
•	Roof deck with a barbecue, fire pit, lounge seating and city views
•	Fitness studio
•	Indoor bike storage and work stand
•	Enclosed residential parking garage

Apartment units feature: 
•	Electric ovens
•	Gas range cooktops
•	Dishwashers
•	Washers and dryers

Higby is designed to operate 25% more efficiently than a code-compliant building. Sustainability highlights contributing to Higby's LEED Gold certification include:
•	Locally sourced and recycle content materials
•	Non-toxic finishes and a building-wide green cleaning program
•	Aggressive construction waste recycling program
•	Native, adaptive plantings to reduce water consumption
•	On-site planters to detain and manage storm water 

So Stretch out. Entertain. Sleep it off. Celebrate pajama day. Declare a lost weekend. Take a conference call from home. Do what you do. Live At Higby.

Monday 9am - 6pm
Tuesday 9am - 6pm
Wednesday 9am - 6pm

I'm moving and looking to rent my apartment. This is a huge one-bedroom apartment on the fourth floor of a five-story building facing the Berkeley Hills in a well lit, quiet neighborhood. The name of the property is Icon at Park (1401 Park Avenue in Emeryville). Inside the apartment is very quiet, you will not hear your neighbors due to solid concrete construction! Here are some the highlights: huge walk-in closet with washer and dryer, large bedroom closet, huge kitchen with granite countertops and nice appliances, separate office area that could be used as a guest bedroom, bathroom has a deep soaking tub, nice balcony for your gas or electric grill, reserved parking spot in the garage, bike storage in the garage, on-site gym. Maintenance and management are very responsive to any requests, plus there's a friendly cleaning lady who takes care of common areas five days a week, so the entire property is very neat!

Get in touch to set up a time for a visit, or if you have additional questions. Thanks!

listings.description:
A bright 900 sq ft 2-story house with an open format, lots of windows, and natural light with a lovely loft bedroom, washer and dryer and gardening/outdoor space for rent in West Berkeley. The house is located in the back of a long lot with the owner's house in the front. The arrangement of the two houses allows for a fair amount of privacy. Located in a terrific neighborhood and a desirable location: a 12-minute walk to the North Berkeley Bart and blocks away from bus lines, yummy restaurants, 4th Street, Whole Foods, REI, parks, bike lanes, etc. Perfect for professionals, grad students or academics, who desire a quiet, private space to call home in Berkeley. Would also be an ideal live-work space for an artist. No more than two people, and no smokers please. 

Details:
•	Quiet modern open-format one bedroom with lots of windows and great light
•	Terrific neighborhood and tree-lined street
•	Fridge, Range, and Washer and Dryer included
•	Outdoor space for picnic tables and potential for gardening
•	Unfurnished, but a queen sized mattress available if desired
•	Plentiful street parking
•	Limited storage for bikes, etc
•	Great walk-ability: close to 4th Street, the Indian district on University, several parks, bike lanes, public pools, basketball and tennis courts, grocery stores and more
•	Easy access to UC Berkeley
•	Blocks from BART, buses, Amtrak
•	Easy access to I-80

Terms:
•	One Year's Lease
•	Rent per Month: $3200 
•	Security Deposit: $4500
•	Owner pays for garbage, water and for gardening
•	Tenant pays for all other utilities (PG+E, internet, phone, etc)
•	Must have good credit
•	Pets negotiable with an additional deposit
•	Available immediately or in April 2016

12-month lease required. First month's rent plus $4500 security deposit needed to move in. Prospective tenants to provide:
•	Rental application
•	Current credit report with excellent FICO score
•	Employment information with contact for current and recent employers

Contact:
Please contact the owner for more information or to arrange a viewing time. Please share a bit about yourself and your housing needs/desires.

listings.title: Spacious Studio 4 Blocks From BART!

listings.description:
AVAILABLE: April 1st. Ready to sign a lease any time.

SHOWINGS: Email/message me and we can set up an appointment. Serious inquiries only please.

THE STUDIO: Fossel Farm's sweet and artistically furnished golden yellow studio has refinished wood floors and faces into the front garden of our urban farm. It has a nice big window with Eastern exposure and great morning light. The kitchen is on the north wall of the studio with a small sink, compact gas stove, under-the-counter fridge--all quite new--and a three stool eating nook. Its full bathroom has a brand new standing shower and a nice tile floor. The closet is generous for one, fine for two. Zero-VOC paint throughout.

THE HOUSE: The Fossel Farmhouse is an Edwardian style 2 level house, built in 1911, organically rustic and resounding with charm. There are two 3BR apartments and 2 single room studios. It was renovated 15 years ago, with continuing improvements ever since, many of them handcrafted by your hosts. The exterior of the house is newly repainted with fresh colors. Shared brand new laundry machines are at the back of the house in a greenhouse-style laundry shed. The foundation is bolted and sheer-walled--very earthquake safe.

THE LOCATION: Right in the heart of the great little neighborhood of lower Shattuck Avenue just south of downtown Berkeley (where Shattuck goes down to 2 lanes), this house is 3 blocks to Ashby BART train station, and has a #18 bus stop right outside that takes you to either downtown Berkeley or Downtown Oakland. We are a 15-25 minute walk or 5-10 minute bike ride to the businesses and nightlife of all of the following: Downtown Berkeley, the Elmwood, Temescal, as well as CAL (UC Berkeley). 5 minutes to 24/580/880 freeway on-ramp. Walk score of 89. Great location!

THE NEIGHBORHOOD: The house is surrounded within a few blocks by local cafes (Nomad, Renaissance, Jumpin' Java), restaurants (Cafe La Pena, Smokey J's BBQ, Flaco's Taco's, etc), small loft developments, and a friendly neighborhood Irish pub (Starry Plough). Foodie favorites like Crixa Cakes, Sweet Adeline's Bakery, Emilia's Pizzeria, Easy Cajun, and Alchemy Collective are easy walking distance. Both Whole Foods and Berkeley Bowl, widely regarded as the best community market in the East Bay, are five blocks away. The neighborhood continues to develop rapidly with new restaurants and amenities opening all the time.

THE PARKING: The location offers plenty of long-term parking that's good for a week or more if you pay attention to the signs and avoid monthly or bimonthly street cleaning. Parking is 2 hours in front of the house, but only during the hours of 8am-6pm each day, so works easily for overnight parking. 

THE PROPERTY: Our Edwardian farmhouse sits on a large fully-fenced double lot with a generous front yard, huge backyard, and two side yards. The property offers very nice rustic indoor/outdoor living. There are two outdoor eating tables w chairs, three shade umbrellas, teak lounge chairs, a copper firepit on brick hearth, ping pong table, outdoor hanging lights, lots of potted plants (succulents, aloe, orchids, bougainvillea etc), handcrafted red brick pizza oven with grill (half complete), art studio/shed, and kids area (sandbox, puppet theater, toys, scooters, trike, soccer goal etc). 

THE GARDENS: Our vegetable and flower gardens which are mostly in the side and backyards consist of 20+ raised beds (always changing but some usual food plant suspects: chard, kale, mixed greens, arugula, potatoes, tomatoes, basil, strawberries, beets, beans, edamame, rhubarb, onions etc). We have 5 chickens on the north side of the house, our Angora rabbit "bun bun", and keep two low-risk honeybee hives on top of our art studio. Currently the front yard features morning glory vines, a lemon tree, Neroli orange tree, false bamboo, roses, potato vine, as well as an expanding herb garden and a sitting area for two with brick hearth. Lastly, there are four raised beds on the sidewalk with succulents and California poppies, as well as a peach and a walnut tree.

TERMS: Studio is available April 1st. Rent is $2000 monthly, deposit is $2000. We pay high speeed internet, water, gas, electric, trash--you pay only rent. Fully furnished. Lease negotiable, but for the fall or through the spring is ideal.

SHOWINGS: Message me and we can set up an appointment. Serious inquiries only please.

Thanks!

Contact Pedram by text or email to RSVP (required). #



Nice & Clean, Spacious South Berkeley Apartment

Gas Stove, Spacious Floor Plan

Newer Paint, Updated Kitchen

Nice size shared backyard

1 Parking Space, Water & Garbage Included

Literary 10 Min Walk to Ashby BART

===================================================
APPLICATION PROCESS (please read):

1) All Applications must be filled out online and Application Fees paid through the portal for them to be considered...

http://eliteapts.com/available-properties/

2) All supporting documents such as pay-stubs, IDs, current and past rental history with phone numbers.. must be attached to the online application please.

3) All the documents must be submitted before we process an application.

4) Submitting an application would require paying an application fee. This fee won't be refunded whether we run your credit or not since the company we contract with would not issue refunds and the money goes to them and not us. So if you genuinely like the apartment, apply. Please set clear expectations before applying. We discourage people from applying unless they see the apt first.

We are 100% transparent and believe in full disclosure.

5) We look at all applications on a first come, first serve basis based on qualifications. 

6) Upon being approved, we require a holding deposit (by 1pm of the next business day) which is part of your move-in deposit so that we would hold the apartment for you. At that time, we remove the ad and email you a lease. 

7) 8) We structure the lease so that the lease end date is no later than the end of the Summer and they'd be Renewable again for a Year at the termination.

9) We require the residents to purchase a Tenant Liability Insurance policy or a Renter's Insurance.
Thank you

BEMG

listings.description:
Lovely, light-filled flat in the heart of the Elmwood district in Berkeley. 

Well maintained hardwood floors and nice paint throughout. 

ELMWOOD
If you're not familiar with the Elmwood neighborhood it is the area surrounding the intersection of College Ave and Ashby in Berkeley. This is a great neighborhood! Plus it's an excellent location for those needing convenient access to UCB or SF! It is both walking distance to the university and to Rockridge BART -- about 15 minutes either way. The Elmwood is home to several restaurants, cafes, and retail shops, it has a first class ice cream shop, plus a movie theater. All this within two blocks of this wonderful home!


DESCRIPTION
This is a 2 bedroom upstairs condo/flat (up approx 16 stairs) of a duplex.

The upstairs flat is approx - 1000 sq feet, and includes: 
Living room
Dining room with built-in
2 bedrooms
Kitchen with granite counters and stainless steel appliances
1 Bathroom 
Washer/Dryer hookups
Private Deck (west facing) off of kitchen -- perfect for a sunny brunch! or moon gazing!
Gas wall heater

***Additional space can be included in rental for additional $300/mo - Office/Studio with separate entrance (cannot be used as a bedroom) - is an additional 180 sq feet. This is a GARDEN LEVEL room with glass door and two windows. It is a finished 10x18' room and has saltillo tile floors. Perfect for someone who works at home but wants to have a completely separate work space. 


PARKING 
The driveway is shared with the downstairs neighbor, and is usually used one month exclusively by the upstairs resident and the next month exclusively by the downstairs resident. There is also fairly easy street parking. 


RENTAL DETAILS
Available April 1
$3150/month
Security Deposit: $4500 ($500 additional if pet is included) 
12 month lease
Well behaved SMALL pet will be considered 
No smoking 
Tenant pays: PG&E, water, garbage 


If you're interested, please write:

listings.title: Bay Bridge Views

listings.description:
Premier living in Richmond's Hilltop district 

San Marcos Apartments in Richmond, California offers convenience so you can focus on fun. Park your vehicle in the comfort of your own private garage, then head inside and spend an evening cozying up next to the fireplace. Whatever your ideal furniture arrangement might be, we offer numerous floor plans in our one- and two-bedroom apartments that are sure to complement your interior design savvy. Controlled, gated access and night patrol means you sleep soundly, and our on-site maintenance team is available 24/7 for all of those "Uh-oh!" moments. Feeling stressed? Take advantage of our fitness center and sports courts for that calorie burn, or stroll down beautifully manicured pathways with your pooch to get some fresh air (yes, of course, these Richmond apartments are pet friendly).

Our location in Richmond's Hilltop neighborhood puts you near tons of great places to shop and dine. Head to the Vista del Mar Village Shopping Center to pick up a latte at Starbucks, or shop to your heart's content at the Hilltop Mall, home to staples like Macy's and JC Penny as well as a Wal-Mart. Fresh air abounds at nearby Hilltop Lake Park, and we are also minutes away from the Richmond Country Club and Pointe Pinole Regional Shoreline. Need to get out of Richmond? Hop on I-80 for an easy drive to other cities in the Bay Area. If you don't feel like wasting gas, we are also near bus lines and a few miles from the Richmond Transit Station.

Life should be enjoyed, and here at San Marcos Apartments you will have plenty of opportunity to do just that.

One bedroom, one bathroom, in-law unit available in the bicycle friendly Santa Fe/NOBE community of North Oakland on the Emeryville border. The apartment is centrally located 1 mile from MacArthur BART and 1 mile from Ashby BART. Downtown Berkeley and the campus are 2.25 miles away. Temescal's great restaurants and bars are a short .75 mile walk away.
_
The bright lower --unit apartment features a spacious kitchenette with a professional grade induction burner, strong hood fan, large toaster oven and new full-sized fridge. The bedroom has a large walk in closet with bonus storage space. The apartment has a separate entrance/exit through the sunny-landscaped backyard. Which features a bocce ball court, fire pit, a picnic table, fruit trees, and BBQ. Tenant has use of one of three raised bed planters for backyard veggies. 
_
Dog friendly backyard. Your dog no longer has to stay cooped up in your apartment all day; you don't have to hire a dog walker. Our dog will exercise your dog. :)
_
Water, electricity, garbage, wireless internet are all included in the rent (there is no cable TV).
This apartment is perfect for a student, or a quiet couple.

Rent is $2000.00 for an individual, $2200.00 for a couple. $500.00 security deposit. Move in is first month, last month + security deposit. 6 month lease, then month to month after that.

- Lower floor of this unit has a complete 1 bedroom unit with kitchen/dinning area and a full bath with washer/dryer.
- Upper floor of this unit has a large, open, 14'x30' north-facing studio, windows on 3 sides, a 10'x12' skylight in the middle of a vaulted ceiling. It also has a full bath, a 8'x10' roof terrace and a coffee bar with sink in the studio area.
This floor was conceived as a studio/office/professional-practice space and it can also be used as a separate studio work/living area. 

This unit has it's own entrance, own mail box and a reserved parking space. Cat and small dog are welcome subject to owner approval.

Owner is a retired architect who design and built this home for himself 8 years ago. He lives on the ground floor.

The flat is conveniently located in North Oakland in close proximity to Emeryville, Berkeley, major freeways and BART (1.2 miles from Ashby, 1.7 miles to MacArthur).

There are 4 bedrooms in the unit. However it's worth us noting that we do recommend that it would be best used as a 3 bedroom. The one bathroom in the unit is between two of the bedrooms (a.k.a. Jack & Jill bathroom), hence making sharing of that bathroom a bit easier if one of those two rooms is used as a common room. In the end, we don't mind how it's used as long as everyone is happy.

We've a cozy modern large 1 bedroom approx. 680 sq ft located in Watergate next to the Emeryville Marina. It's a quiet TOP floor unit with enclosed balcony and beautiful mountain views! 

Property Description:
Watergate is a beautifully landscape 24 acre community on the Emeryville Peninsula on San Francisco Bay. There are 1247 condominium homes in six low rise buildings. There is an extensive variety of recreational facilities and programs. Watergate is conveniently located one mile north from the Bay Bridge, west of the East Shore Freeway 880 and 80, within minutes of downtown San Francisco and /Berkeley. There is easy access to AC Transit, BART and the San Rafael Bridge. Closer to San Francisco's Financial District than many San Francisco neighborhoods, and we have summer!

• Enclosed balcony / patio which can be used for multiple purpose

Warm greetings! We are offering a 900 square foot, 2-bedroom, ground floor duplex, with an open kitchen/living space and extra large bathroom in an amazing North Berkeley neighborhood! It is an easy walk to North Berkeley Bart station (with casual carpool), Andronico's supermarket, gourmet ghetto, and farmer's market, downtown and University.

The kitchen/living space is 17' by 20' feet. It is large enough to accommodate living room and dining room areas. The range is gas. It also includes a stackable washer and dryer. The floors are polished concrete and radiant heated throughout. There is a delightful rose garden view. 9-foot ceilings give a spacious feeling. 

Room # 1 has very sunny southern exposure with windows on 2 sides. It is 12' by 14' feet. Large built- in double closet with drawers. 

Room #2 was built to be used as a music studio. It is a 18' by 12' foot room, light and sound proof (no windows), independent heating and air-conditioning system, reclaimed basketball court floor, and multiple grounded electrical outlets. This room makes an amazing home theater or rehearsal space (read:you can make noise!!) A musicians dream!!

The bathroom is extra large (8' by 12' feet). It includes a 5-½ foot claw foot tub and a walk-in shower.

Requires a $2000 deposit and one year lease.

listings.description:
Lovely, light-filled flat in the heart of the Elmwood district in Berkeley. 

Well maintained hardwood floors and nice paint throughout. 

ELMWOOD
If you're not familiar with the Elmwood neighborhood it is the area surrounding the intersection of College Ave and Ashby in Berkeley. This is a great neighborhood! Plus it's an excellent location for those needing convenient access to UCB or SF! It is both walking distance to the university and to Rockridge BART -- about 15 minutes either way. The Elmwood is home to several restaurants, cafes, and retail shops, it has a first class ice cream shop, plus a movie theater. All this within two blocks of this wonderful home!


DESCRIPTION
This is a 2 bedroom upstairs condo/flat (up approx 16 stairs) of a duplex.

The upstairs flat is approx - 1000 sq feet, and includes: 
Living room
Dining room with built-in
2 bedrooms
Kitchen with granite counters and stainless steel appliances
1 Bathroom 
Washer/Dryer hookups
Private Deck (west facing) off of kitchen -- perfect for a sunny brunch! or moon gazing!
Gas wall heater

***Additional space can be included in rental for additional $300/mo - Office/Studio with separate entrance (cannot be used as a bedroom) - is an additional 180 sq feet. This is a GARDEN LEVEL room with glass door and two windows. It is a finished 10x18' room and has saltillo tile floors. Perfect for someone who works at home but wants to have a completely separate work space. 


PARKING 
The driveway is shared with the downstairs neighbor, and is usually used one month exclusively by the upstairs resident and the next month exclusively by the downstairs resident. There is also fairly easy street parking. 


RENTAL DETAILS
Available April 1
$3150/month
Security Deposit: $4500 ($500 additional if pet is included) 
12 month lease
Well behaved SMALL pet will be considered 
No smoking 
Tenant pays: PG&E, water, garbage

June 1 -- Aug 15 flex (NO shorter lease), with some flexibility at either end. The monthly $2500 rent includes phone (unlimited long distance), DSL, basic utilities charges. Thus, tenants are expected to commit to roughly $6125 total rent for this summer lease.

**Note: we will be able to show our home beginning on Monday, March 28, 2016

Despite its size, house OCCUPANCY IS LIMITED TO TWO PEOPLE (& 1-2 occasional very short term visitors) by owners to keep overall usage of the house to a relatively light level. NO PETS ARE ALLOWED, either outside or inside the house. Although the house is clean, the number of Persian rugs in it does not make it an optimal living space for those who are asthmatic. 

Rent is kept low in recognition that tenants will be expected to water the garden when and where necessary, as well as forward mail.

This spacious (2200+sq ft), private, Mediterranean stucco house is surrounded by woods, with an outdoor dining deck beneath a grape arbor (the picture with the table shaded by umbrella was taken before the umbrella was replaced by the arbor), looking out towards the Golden Gate through the trees, with fruit trees, a sunny backyard, bay views, and a grand piano for the musically inclined. It is about a mile downhill to the UC campus and downtown Berkeley, and within walking distance to bus stops. 

There is an 18 step access down to the house, and no wheelchair accessibility. The house includes:

* Bedrooms: 1 master, 1 inlaw unit w. separate entrance, 1 loft bedroom.
* A small office (inlaw unit also has an office area).
* A dining room and large living room with scenic windows and grand piano.
* Library with woodstove.
* Modern kitchen with dishwasher.
* Laundry nook with washer and dryer. 
* Private cement slab for streetside parking.

listings.title: 16th Floor Skyline Berkeley Hills San Francisco Views from Corner Home

listings.description:
I am looking for one mature and reliable person to live in my adorable studio. There is a private bathroom, pull out love seat, a natural gas fire pit in the yard, a storage shed, a gas grill, and a few fruit trees. There is a kitchenette with a nice double induction burner, blender/food processor, induction kettle, microwave, convection oven, plenty of storage space,and mini-fridge. The room is fully furnished with queen bed, pillows, desk and chair, heater, sheets, towels, and kitchen supplies (including some staples like spices, rice, four, oil, etc). I will even consider letting you use my bike if you are trustworthy. The place is really cute with lots of light. The neighborhood is very quiet. There is a great park 2 blocks away and many groceries, coffee shops, laundromats, bars, and restaurants within walking distance. There is a bus at the end of the street that gets you right onto campus within 15 minutes or you can bike there in 15 minutes. You have a pretty great view of the city from the top of the driveway as this neighborhood is up on a hill. Landlord is fine with guests as long as you let her know.

The move in/out dates are semi-negotiable but you would have to be out by August 21st at the latest. $500 deposit (refundable assuming no damage). Rent includes all utilities. No pets - sorry. 

There are a few odd things about the place. The cottage is a mother-in-law suite - as in: it is in the backyard of the main house where the landlord and her 2 children live. The bathroom that goes with the cottage is connected to the back of the main house. It is a private bathroom with only one entrance from the outside which is about ten steps outside the front door of the cottage. So you have to walk outside to get to the bathroom, but not far, and it is your bathroom alone. Also - there is no sink in the studio so you have to do dishes in the bathroom sink. I have a dish drainer setup in the bathroom and the sink is not prohibitively small. While this is a strange setup, I have never had issues with it at all.

The landlord will want to meet you but other than that you won't interact with her much. You basically have 100% privacy in the unit and backyard and it is nice and quiet.

listings.title: 2 bedroom near UC Berkeley Available Now!!

listings.description:
This house is stunning! 

•	Ideal location near shops but on a quiet street, 
•	Sweeping bay views, 
•	Lots of light and windows, 
•	Two large decks, one engineered to support a hottub 
•	High ceilings, 
•	Top quality remodeled kitchen with gas stove, cherry cabinets, and marble countertops. 
•	Wood floors throughout, 
•	Radiant floor heating, 
•	Garage, storage, yard, 
•	Fireplace, privacy, an outdoor shower with a view of the bay.... 

This place has it all! 

4+ Bedroom, 3 bathroom house located half a block from Indian Rock Park, which is one block above the Marin Circle. There is also a "bonus room" that is a perfect office space or baby's room. 

Monthly rent: $7,500. Electrical, water and garbage included. 
Security deposit: $10,000 
Available March 15 or April 1, 2016 (negotiable). 
Minimum 1 year lease. No cigarettes and no cats or dogs, please. 

The views stretch unimpeded from Mt Tam, Sausalito, the Marin Headlands, the Golden Gate, the City, and past the Bay Bridge to the south bay. Waking up and looking out across the bay is a great way to start your day! 

This house was carefully remodeled by the owner to preserve its old-style charm, and this is the first time it will be rented. The house has been featured in two different architectural books! 

The neighborhood is safe, has easy street parking, lots of trees and views and is great for walks on off-street paths. 

It's a 10 minute bike ride to campus and a 5 minute walk to Solano Ave (restaurants, market, Peets, etc) and about a 25 minute walk to downtown BART or to UC Berk campus. There is also a commuter express bus to downtown SF that passes just 1 block away. 

Looking for tenants who are clean, considerate, responsible, and financially stable.
listings.title: Coming Soon! Classically remodeled house in North Berkeley!
listings.address: Shattuck Ave at Indian Rock Ave

listings.description:
Great 2 bedroom/1 bathroom house with laundry, parking, and a private outdoor sitting area. 

This cute 2 bedroom is located at the end of a quiet dead end street. We are remodeling right now, but when we're done, the place will have big windows, hardwood floors, fresh paint, new appliances, spacious bedrooms, living room and kitchen. (Photos coming soon!) There is also a front yard with a pomogranite and a lemon tree, and a small private sitting area on the side of the house. This house is part of a side by side duplex and the laundry is shared. There is also one off street parking spot in the driveway reserved for this unit. 

The house is a 20 minute walk from Ashby Bart, 10 minute walk to the Transbay bus, 5 minute walk to several main bus routes into downtown Oakland and Downtown Berkeley, and within a mile of Pixar Berkeley Bowl West, the South Berkeley Farmer's Market, Sweet Adeline, Actual Cafe, Victory Burger, Berkeley Ironworks, Prizefighter bar, Rotten City Pizza, Wolfhound, the Missouri Lounge and so much more. 

The house was just purchased and will likely be ready for move in in mid-April. If you are interested, please send a little bit about yourself including how flexible your move-in date is and when you would be available to see the house. 

No dogs. Cats will be considered.
listings.title: Great 2 Bedroom/1 bath on the Berkeley/Oakland/Emeryville border

listings.description:
Ok, a little early. Current tenant giving lots of notice. This is a wonderful in law for the right person. It is the entire downstairs of my home. Yes, I have kids, pets and am not looking for more. It is tiled throughout, has great light in the afternoon (yep when the sun gets to it!). 
The place is huge by current standards. I could call it a studio, but that is just how it is laid out for max heat and feel. It is a one bedroom. There is a separate entrance, full kitchen, backyard, bath with shower (no tub).
Since it is part of the "house" I do not charge for utilities, water, wifi. cable etc. Heat is a gas fireplace. This is more space than typical in laws. Walk in closet. No laundry onsite. Price for one occupant 1800, for two 2000.
We are an active family and yes you will hear family noise. It is also quiet much of the time. Have been renting this space for 20 years and always find the right person. It is what it is! mail with your phone number if interested and will tell you more before showing. Month to month, deposit and first and last.

listings.title: Perfect Location In Berkeley! Along with A Great Price!

listings.description:
Check out this charming, garden cottage! The unit is one-bedroom, one, spacious bathroom, has plenty of closet space, kitchen, living room, spacious back porch area, and a tiny garden.
Located in West Berkeley, behind a duplex, this cottage stands on it its own, and features recently carpeted floors, plenty of counter space, and a lovely view of your friendly, front neighbor's garden. It is a convenient, five minute walk from Berkeley Bowl West (groceries) and a ten minute bike ride to Ashby BART. Nearby bus lines are the 72 San Pablo, the Transbay Z line, the 82Z, and the 49. It is also located within walking distance of a number of excellent restaurants and cafes, like Paisan, Mint Leaf, Anjalee, 100 Grayson and Café Trieste. The apartment is very secure (it is accessed through a locking side-gate), sunny, full of light, acoustic music-friendly, full of beautiful woodwork, and ready to rent immediately. Appliances included are a refrigerator, range, wall heater, and bathroom wall heater. Water and Garbage are included. Deposit is $2,100, plus last month's rent. Rent is $2,100 a month, one-year lease required. No Section 8, no pets.

listings.title: Amazing Apartments Walking Distance from Berkeley University

listings.description: Ten minute walk from the University and a ten minute walk to the coveted Gourmet Ghetto. Contemporary design, wonderful neighborhood, lots of outdoor space including a "zen garden", patio, and backyard. Stunning views of San Francisco, Oakland, and Berkeley. One car garage with Level 2 car charger and new elliptical machine included. (Partially furnished).
listings.title: Newly renovated, contemporary and furnished North Berkeley Home

listings.description:
Large and sunny one bedroom flat with interior split level design. Built in 1936, this 2-unit building with old Berkeley charm has fabulous views of the Bay, SF, Bay Bridge, and large west view window faces on the Golden Gate Bridge and gorgeous sunsets. To the South are views of the Campanile, Oakland, and South Bay. Spacious living room, fireplace, hardwood floors, and a sleeping loft with a view--in addition to the one bedroom. There are high-end window coverings for the big view windows in the living room, and Bali shades in the dining room and bedroom. The bathroom has a redwood surround for the deep vintage tub/shower; in the bedroom and dining room there are space-saving redwood "eyebrow shelves" for your books and collectibles. Small patio outdoor space as well as a redwood porch with Bay and SF View.
5 blocks from Gourmet Ghetto and 5 blocks from Campus. Please be advised that leading up to the flat from the street there are 31 stairs. Free Washer/Dryer on site shared with upstairs tenants. Garbage/recycle service included, all other utilities are tenant's responsibility. Walk to BART, bus stop is just steps away on Cedar and Euclid. Easy street parking with City of Berkeley G permit. There are storage closets in the flat and limited shared storage space available in basement. Cat ok with landlord approval. 
$2800 month, $3300 deposit and references required. Perfect space for a couple.
Available May 1 with 5-6 month lease, thereafter month-to-month. Can rent furnished (with dishes and other household necessities) or unfurnished. No smoking, references required.
Email or call Carole (no texts, please)

for more information and to make appointment to see.
listings.title: Large & Sunny Flat, Fabulous Views, Prime North Berkeley Location

We have three 2 bedroom, 1 bath Units Available Now at 1927 Dwight Way. These Units are 782 sf with water and garbage included . One unit is available with a big balcony Renting for $2695. The other two units are Renting for $2595. Berkeley is known for it's UC Berkeley campus and the best restaurants around. Our units are great for college students looking for a place with roommates. Berkeley is also good when it comes to public transportation such as AC Transit and BART. We also offer parking spots for rent as well. Deposit is $2,000. Sorry but no pets. listings.title: 2 bedroom near UC Berkeley Available Now!!

listings.description:
2057 University Avenue was formerly known as the University Hotel. The University Hotel is no longer in operation and the building has since been converted into an apartment building which offers single room apartments. The building is located on University and Shattuck Avenue. It is located 2 blocks away from the west end of the UC Berkeley Campus. It is a few short blocks away from modes of public transportation such as AC Transit and Bart. The Downtown Berkeley Bart Station connects Berkeley with the greater Bay Area. Bart, which is the Bay Area's Rapid Transit rail system makes it possible to reach destinations such as Downtown San Francisco or the San Francisco International Airport in a matter of minutes. The building is nearby the many eateries, shops, and businesses which make up Downtown Berkeley located on Shattuck Avenue. You will be sharing a common bathroom with all utilities included. Please call Raj Properties at



The room is a single dorm style room with a private bathroom. The room is ideal for a person looking to live a minimalist lifestyle. The room itself is cozy and includes built in wall shelves and a desk and chair. The room also includes a mini refrigerator and a microwave. The room does not have a kitchen sink or stove. The building has a lot of character. Walking through the hallways transports you to another time in Berkeley's history.

We have Several One Bedrooms Available Now or Soon Renting for $1195 
We have a One Room/ 1 Bathroom Available Now Renting for $1295

If you are interested in viewing the room in person please call our leasing office between the hours of 8:00am and 5:00pm Monday through Friday. We look forward to speaking with you.

listings.title: Newly renovated Berkeley apt.

listings.description:
This house is stunning! 

•	Ideal location near shops at top of Solano Ave but on a quiet street, 
•	Sweeping bay views, 
•	Lots of light and windows, 
•	Two large decks, one engineered to support a hot tub 
•	High ceilings, 
•	Top quality remodeled kitchen with gas stove, cherry cabinets, and marble counter tops. 
•	Wood floors throughout, 
•	Radiant floor heating, 
•	Garage, storage, yard, 
•	Half a block from Indian Rock,
•	Freshly painted, 
•	Fireplace, privacy, an outdoor shower with a view of the bay.... 

This place has it all! 

4+ Bedroom, 3 bathroom house located half a block from Indian Rock Park, which is one block above the Marin Circle. There is also a "bonus room" that is a perfect office space with full SF and bay view. 

Monthly rent: $6,950. Electrical is offset by solar panels. 
Security deposit: $10,000 
Available April 1, 2016 
Minimum 1 year lease. No cigarettes please. Cats or dogs negotiable. 

The views stretch unimpeded from Mt Tam, Sausalito, the Marin Headlands, the Golden Gate, the City, and past the Bay Bridge to the south bay. Waking up and looking out across the bay is a great way to start your day! 

This house was carefully remodeled by the owner to preserve its style and charm. The house has been featured in two different architectural books! 

The neighborhood is safe, has easy street parking, lots of trees and views and is great for walks on off-street paths. 

It's a 10 minute bike ride to UC campus and a 5 minute walk to Solano Ave (restaurants, market, Peets, etc) and about a 25 minute walk to Berkeley BART or North Berkeley BART or to UC Berk campus. There is also a commuter express bus to downtown SF that passes just 1 block away. 

Looking for tenants who are clean, considerate, responsible, and financially stable. Call or email to schedule a viewing.

listings.title: MODERN ONE BEDROOM, IN THE HEART OF DOWNTOWN BERKELEY!!!

listings.description:
Are you part of a group, and looking for a gorgeous house right near UC Berkeley, in the most yummy part of town -- in the northside gourmet ghetto?

For more than 10 years, our house has been hosting groups of undergrads and grad students. Everyone who has lived here has loved it. Your group, will too!

This house is fully furnished with a total of 20 beds within 7 bedrooms.

Your group of up to 20 can rent the entire house, or, you can rent a block of beds.

The house is open for move-in August 15 2016. We also have availabilities during the summer for anyone who needs summer accommodations.

House Features and Details You'll Appreciate. . .
- Awesome 170 meg download internet! This house is ultra wired and ready to roll!
- 7 bedrooms: 1 Single, 2 Doubles, 2 Triples, and 2 Quads, all are furnished.
- The rooms are quite large with fantastic views, big windows, sunlight. Most rooms have twin beds, the single has a full bed.
- Huge living/dining room & kitchen fully equipped with everything you'll need to cook, 3 refrigerators
- Big-Screen HDTV, 2 printers, NEST smart thermostats so you can easily monitor heating usage in winter
- Washer/dryer, dishwasher, up to date appliances
- So close to campus, you can walk in 5 to 15 minutes depending where you're going.
- Perfect Location in the Gourmet Ghetto.... Berkeley's finest restaurants, a drugstore just down the block, multiple grocery stores & farmer's markets
- Redwood deck in the back is the perfect place to hang out in the sun, study, have a get-together, BBQ
- Green electricity from solar panels, numerous other ecological house features

Rental Price
Important Note -- The rental price listed, $1699, is the average cost per person per month if you book in advance and you are part of a group. Multiply that number by the number of people in your group to get the total cost per month. The price may be higher or lower depending on size of group, send us an application for further details. Utilities cost is an average of 100 per person per month. 

Want to See More Photos & a Video?
Email us for way more photos plus a video tour of the house.

How To Apply
Please email us and we'll respond with details on how to apply.

Thanks, we look forward to meeting you soon. And... GO BEARS!

listings.description:
We are looking for a roommate for the living room in a two-bedroom apt in downtown Berkeley. 

The move-in date is immediate.
The lease ends on August 18th, 2016.

You will be living with two girls. I'm an undergrad majored in Psychology. My roommate works at SF, and she's only home during nights/weekends. We prefer UC Berkeley affiliated students, scholars and faculty. We also prefer same gender roommate.

The location is on 2020 Kittredge St, Berkeley. The property is professionally managed by Library Gardens. The place is right next to Downtown Berkeley Bart Station, and Target, Walgreens, Starbucks, Bank of America and many many restaurants. 


The living-room is now for rent: $880/month with about $30 utility (wifi included)

The apartment building is really new and has all the facilities you need. We also keep the apartment very clean and nice. 
- Living room has windows with great light source
- Free WIFI
- Well furnished, secured gate, laundry on the same floor
- The kitchen has everything, oven, microwave, dishwasher and fridge.
- You can get a room divider to ensure privacy
- Quiet living environment
- Parking garage available at $135/month

Email me if you're interested with questions, a little bit background information and move-in date.


Thanks!

Great view from private patio over looking Delaware Street along with plenty of closet space including a walk in hall closet. 

We are within easy walking distance to UC Berkeley and great restaurants along University Avenue. Close to BART station on just a few blocks form the University campus. 

Apartment is located in a small building, so you get to know your neighbors and breeds more of a community than most buildings and tends to be quieter.

listings.description:
Welcome To Higby

Built In 2015.

A refined living experience in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley. With modern apartments and inviting common areas, Higby creates a place that is both home and a gathering space. Within walking distance to craft breweries, celebrated restaurants, organic markets and cultural highlights, Higby celebrated exploration and adventure. 

Higby offers studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments in the heart of historic Southwest Berkeley

Modern building amenities include: 
•	Lobby with lounge seating and TV
•	Courtyard with a bocce ball court
•	Roof deck with a barbecue, fire pit, lounge seating and city views
•	Fitness studio
•	Indoor bike storage and work stand
•	Enclosed residential parking garage

Apartment units feature: 
•	Electric ovens
•	Gas range cooktops
•	Dishwashers
•	Washers and dryers

Higby is designed to operate 25% more efficiently than a code-compliant building. Sustainability highlights contributing to Higby's LEED Gold certification include:
•	Locally sourced and recycle content materials
•	Non-toxic finishes and a building-wide green cleaning program
•	Aggressive construction waste recycling program
•	Native, adaptive plantings to reduce water consumption
•	On-site planters to detain and manage storm water 

So Stretch out. Entertain. Sleep it off. Celebrate pajama day. Declare a lost weekend. Take a conference call from home. Do what you do. Live At Higby.


Office Hours
Monday 9am - 6pm
Tuesday 9am - 6pm
Wednesday 9am - 6pm
Thursday 9am - 6pm
Friday 9am - 6pm
Saturday 10am - 5pm
Sunday 10am - 5pm

3015 SAN PABLO AVE, Berkeley, CA 94702

Contact us



www.livehigby.com

https://www.facebook.com/LiveHigby/?fref=ts

3-Bedroom/1-Bath
Available June 1, 2016

**Showing on Wednesday March 30th @ 5:30-6pm. No need to RSVP, please just arrive on-time**

Gorgeous and spacious 3-bedroom apartment available in the Hillegass Court Apartments for June 1st. Apartment has been updated with modern amenities but still retains its historical charms like hardwood floors and large built-ins. Kitchen was remodeled to feature stainless steel appliances (fridge/freezer, stove/oven, and microwave) and new fixtures. Bathroom has newer fixtures and has nicely done tiling and details.

Two of the bedrooms are spacious and can easily be used as doubles. Third bedroom is more cozy and is better suited as a single.

Building is conveniently located on Berkeley's bike boulevard network (Hillegass Avenue route) and is a short walk/bike ride to the UC Berkeley campus and Willard Park (1-block away). Many shops and restaurants are located within easy walking distance on College Avenue. Indoor bike racks are provided as a free amenity for residents and credit card-operated laundry machines are located on-site. Off-street parking can be rented for an additional fee (subject to availability).

.

Early Bird special (DISCOUNT from $1,799/month) - 

Apply at first open house & sign lease within 24 hours of credit approcal

discounted to $1,599/ month only, lease until 7/30/2017 (non-negotiable)

==

Beautiful Upstairs Suite (not dark basement or behind someone's home) !!

LARGE fully remodeled Studio Suite, big enough for 2 people.


SIZE: Main room ~ 14' X 13.5' + private kitchen ~ 12' X 8' + private bathroom with full-sized bathtub + big 5' X 14' walk-in closet + lots of built-in storage cabinets. Total over 450 s.f. of living space!!

listings.description:
Fully furnished, remodeled condo available late April until late October

This condo includes HOA dues, garbage, and water. 

Unit Features 
Upstairs unit, very bright, quiet and secure. Freshly painted, new carpets and recently remodeled.
Kitchen : stainless steel appliances. Granite counters and maple cabinets. Comes complete with cookware, glassware, dinner service for 8.
Dining Room : Dining table for 4/6 
Living Room : Contemporary lighting, wood burning fireplace, nice artwork, bookshelves, coffee and end table, comfortable sofa/futon, leather chairs, 39" LCD TV on a pivoting bracket over fireplace, internet router. 
Bedroom : Queen size bed with night tables, bookshelves, dresser, desk and walk in closet. 
Bathroom : Granite counters, stone floors, maple cabinets, sliding glass shower doors and tub, designer colors and lighting. 
Laundry : Full size washer and dryer with overhead cabinets, broom closet, vacuum cleaner, iron and ironing board. Towels and bed linen provided.
Deck : Gas barbecue, bistro table and chairs. Nice morning and afternoon sun and mature trees. Access to hot water heater and storage off deck. (perfect to store your bike)
Amenities

Swimming Pool and Spa. Great fitness Center. 
Gated with 24 hour security.
Access to the Bay Trail with hiking and bicycle paths
Close access to BART , UC Berkeley, Marin and the charming village of Point Richmond.

Non-Smoker
No Pets

listings.description:
AVAILABLE APRIL 1st 2016

Want to live at the waterfront in the most convenient location across the Bay from San Francisco with:

•	Easy freeway access to San Francisco
•	Convenient carpool to San Francisco Financial District
•	Daily free shuttle from Watergate to BART, AMTRAK, TransBay buses
•	Steps away from Bay Street Plaza, which hosts multiple premier shopping outlets, fine restaurants, and movie theatre
•	24/7 On-site Security
We've a cozy modern large 1 bedroom approx. 700sq ft located in Watergate next to the Emeryville Marina. It's a quiet TOP floor unit with enclosed balcony and beautiful mountain views! 

Property Description:
Watergate is a beautifully landscape 24 acre community on the Emeryville Peninsula on San Francisco Bay. There are 1247 condominium homes in six low rise buildings. There is an extensive variety of recreational facilities and programs. Watergate is conveniently located one mile north from the Bay Bridge, west of the East Shore Freeway 880 and 80, within minutes of downtown San Francisco and /Berkeley. There is easy access to AC Transit, BART and the San Rafael Bridge. Closer to San Francisco's Financial District than many San Francisco neighborhoods, and we have summer! 

Apartment Features:
• Enclosed balcony / patio which can be used for multiple purpose
• Large living room with separate dedicated area for dining room 
• Modernized kitchen with granite countertops, oven, electric range, refrigerator, etc.
• Updated bathroom

The Rent Includes:
• Covered parking space 
• Cable TV
• Trash removal
• Water
• FREE Use of Club facilities

Community Features:
Garage parking, club house, fitness center, 4 swimming pools (2 heated pools), 4 tennis courts, racquetball, sauna/spa, elevator, Onsite laundry area, guest parking and 24 hours security.

One year lease. No smoking and Pet free. Show by appointment only. Please email us if you want to see our beautiful apartment. Thank you!

listings.description:
Completely renovated with many luxury upgrades. This house is known as Shaklee house; founder of one of the largest CA companies, Shaklee Corp, lived here for many years. 

There are gorgeous views of what seems like the whole Bay, including San Mateo bridge! 

Three bedrooms, three bath, 2400 sq ft, formal dining area, large living room, family room, master bedroom with winter garden, a beautiful enclosed sunroom, huge beautiful bedroom upstairs, vaulted ceilings, woodburning fireplace in living room, electrical in family room. 

New kitchen with granite countertops, includes all appliances. Indoor Jacuzzi. Laundry room with front loading washer and dryer. 
Hardwood floor, travertine floor in living room. 
There is an elevator to the second store. 

Two car garage, with many cabinets. Balcony to take in those beautiful sunsets. 
Gorgeous garden. Pond with waterfall. And much more! 

Vannoy Elementary School, part of the prestigious Castro Valley School District, is 5 blocks away. Our kids went to the best US universities after public Castro Valley schools. 

Upper Center Street; great neighborhood, court location. Easy access to freeways and BART; it takes 35 minutes by Bart to downtown San Francisco. 

Great weather, same as in Palo Alto / San Mateo. 

Credit score, employment and income verification required 
Ready for move in now. 
Rent: $4,200/month. Gardener included. 

5286 Dunnigan Ct. in Castro Valley 



Open house is on Saturday and Sunday at 11 a.m.

listings.description:
Southshore Gardens Apartments is a gated community with a beautiful courtyard and garden setting. We offer one, two-bedroom apartments and cottage homes. 

A one-bedroom apartment is ready for immediate occupancy. This unit is downstairs, bright and spacious at approximately 735 Square Feet with a private yard. In addition to the above, a carport parking along with a 9' x 3' x 5' storage space are also available. 

Rent: $2,175 (includes water, sewer & garbage). Tenant pays electricity and gas.

Southshore Gardens Apartments is conveniently located in Alameda, a block from beautiful Crown Memorial Beach and the very popular Alameda Town Centre Shopping Center where you will find almost everything you need. The Transbay Express bus to Mission and First Street in Downtown San Francisco, and buses to Fruitvale BART and the Alameda/Oakland Ferry are just feet away. Freeway 880 is easily accessible to San Francisco, Oakland, Berkeley and Fremont.

Community features:
- Beautiful Courtyard and Garden Setting
- Community Pool
- Four On-Site Laundry Rooms
- Eco Friendly - Recycling 
- On-Site Management & Maintenance
- Carport Parking

Interior Features:
- Wide Glass Windows
- Fresh Paint
- Refrigerator
- Oven

Pet Policy: Indoor cats, spayed/neutered are allowed (maximum two) with additional deposit and monthly rent.

Come tour our community today. 
We are located at 417 Willow St, Alameda, CA 94501 or call

to schedule a tour today!

Thank you for viewing this posting!

listings.description:
The stunning Mediterranean Village Apartments are the perfect choice for anyone who wants a peaceful suburban lifestyle with easy access to the Bay Area and the State Capitol, at a price they can afford. Whether you're commuting to Emeryville or Vacaville, UC Berkeley or UC Davis, San Francisco or Sacramento, you're halfway there!!! Fairfield is convenient to so much of Northern California.

They're upscale homes, well-appointed with wood-burning fireplaces,walk-in closets and spacious floor plans. The manicured common areas include a sparkling pool heated spa, and clubhouse. There's an onsite laundry facility, as well. Conveniently close to the I-80 freeway, good neighbors, attentive management, and a great location that is walking distant from the gorgeous 30 acre Laurel Creek Park. Just look at the pictures on our website and you'll see what an incredible deal you're getting! 

Call us to learn more at



Please check out:

http://mediterraneanvillageapts.com
listings.title: San Francisco or Sacramento, You're Half Way There!!!

listings.description: Live Here Now  Call Now:  1826 Poggi St, Alameda, CA, 94501Want more info on this unit? See the link (below):http://live.fpimgt.com/332n90 Over 100 years ago, Alameda Island became a popular resort destination for Bay Area families retreating from city life. Now Summer House Apartments in Alameda recaptures the easy elegance and breezy fun of those bygone days. Its classic Cape Cod architectural elements and expansive interiors complement Alameda's charming Victorian homes and tree-lined streets. artistic, poetic, funky, unique.

To the right of the entry is a small hallway leading to a walk in closet and tiled bathroom with redwood shower stall. The floor is a composite wood shearing material (OSB)... The cabin is located behind a brown shingle duplex 4674 Dolores Ave. Oakland 94602. Face the duplex and walk down the driveway on the left and through a wooden gate, continue down the path to cabin.
